<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Policy Fragment: # API XSS Protection Extention"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="By default API Gateway Threat Protection Policy is included"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Customize this policy to add additional protection if necessary"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CodeInjectionProtectionAssertion>
            <L7p:IncludeBody booleanValue="true"/>
            <L7p:IncludeUrlPath booleanValue="true"/>
            <L7p:IncludeUrlQueryString booleanValue="true"/>
            <L7p:Protections codeInjectionProtectionTypeArray="included">
                <L7p:item protectionType="htmlJavaScriptInjection"/>
                <L7p:item protectionType="hexEncodedInjection"/>
            </L7p:Protections>
            <L7p:Target target="REQUEST"/>
        </L7p:CodeInjectionProtectionAssertion>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>

<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Target Configuration Policy: "OTK Authorization Website Template""/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="=== Set custom values for Context Variables below ==="/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="=== Add any new Context Variables or extensions below ==="/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:TrueAssertion>
                    <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="// DISABLE or REMOVE to activate branch"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Properties>
                    </L7p:AssertionComment>
                </L7p:TrueAssertion>
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${content}"/>
                    <L7p:Expression2 stringValue=""/>
                    <L7p:Negate booleanValue="true"/>
                    <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item binary="included">
                            <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                            <L7p:Negated booleanValue="true"/>
                            <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                            <L7p:RightValue stringValue=""/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                    <L7p:Comment stringValue="=== getting started: copy variable 'content' found at around line 29 of the target policy"/>
                </L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <L7p:assertionComment>
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="// success, check that variable 'error.content' is empty and overwrite 'content'"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:assertionComment>
            </wsp:All>
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:TrueAssertion>
                    <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="// DISABLE or REMOVE to activate branch"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Properties>
                    </L7p:AssertionComment>
                </L7p:TrueAssertion>
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${error.msg}"/>
                    <L7p:Expression2 stringValue=""/>
                    <L7p:Negate booleanValue="true"/>
                    <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item binary="included">
                            <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                            <L7p:Negated booleanValue="true"/>
                            <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                            <L7p:RightValue stringValue=""/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                    <L7p:Comment stringValue="=== getting started: copy 'error.msg' found at around line 37 of the target policy"/>
                </L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <L7p:assertionComment>
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="// error, check that variable 'error.msg' is not empty and overwrite it"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:assertionComment>
            </wsp:All>
            <L7p:assertionComment>
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="// responses"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:assertionComment>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Policy Fragment: #OTK CIBA Initiate User Authentication"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Policy Fragment: If the User authentication initiation fails, this policy should falsify itself."/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Context Variables:"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="user_req_id : User Request Id"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="user_info: User info"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="binding_message: Binding message"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="expiration: Expire time in seconds"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="scope: Scope"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="client_key: Client Key"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="client_name: client_name"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Policy Fragment: #OTK CIBA User Authentication Status"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Fetch and update the  User Auth Status. This policy is called from 'OTK CIBA Auth Request ID Validation' as part of the /v2/token service flow."/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Auth Status ctx variable - authStatus (INITIATED/EXPIRED/REJECTED/ACCEPTED)"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Auth Time ctx variable - auth_time (optional - epoch time)"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Optionally also set - acr_values, response_type, scope_granted, state, salt, nonce"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Please ref to 'OTK CIBA Auth Request ID Validation' for the context variables available here."/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Policy Fragment: #OTK CIBA id_token_hint Validation"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Customize this policy to add additional validations for id_token_hint"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Ensure to set any new field including resource_owner within user_info"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:Encapsulated>
                    <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigGuid stringValue="755e056d-fe4a-440c-81ac-cc76dfd58899"/>
                    <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigName stringValue="OTK id_token Lookup"/>
                    <L7p:Parameters mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="azp"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="${client_id}"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="custom"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue=""/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="format"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue=""/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="jwt"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="${id_token_hint}"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="resource_owner"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue=""/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="sub"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue=""/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Parameters>
                </L7p:Encapsulated>
                <L7p:ResponseXpathAssertion>
                    <L7p:VariablePrefix stringValue="xpathJwt"/>
                    <L7p:XmlMsgSrc stringValue="resp"/>
                    <L7p:XpathExpression xpathExpressionValue="included">
                        <L7p:Expression stringValue="/ns:values/ns:value/ns:jwt"/>
                        <L7p:Namespaces mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="s"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="ns"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="http://ns.l7tech.com/2012/11/otk-tokenstore"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Namespaces>
                        <L7p:XpathVersion xpathVersion="XPATH_1_0"/>
                    </L7p:XpathExpression>
                </L7p:ResponseXpathAssertion>
                <L7p:DecodeJsonWebToken>
                    <L7p:SourcePayload stringValue="${xpathJwt.result}"/>
                    <L7p:TargetVariablePrefix stringValue="resp"/>
                    <L7p:ValidationType stringValue="None"/>
                </L7p:DecodeJsonWebToken>
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtyZXNwLnBheWxvYWR9"/>
                    <L7p:ContentType stringValue="application/json; charset=utf-8"/>
                    <L7p:DataType variableDataType="message"/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="id_token_payload"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpressionV2>
                    <L7p:Expression stringValue="$.aud"/>
                    <L7p:OtherTargetMessageVariable stringValue="id_token_payload"/>
                    <L7p:Target target="OTHER"/>
                    <L7p:VariablePrefix stringValue="jwtAud"/>
                </L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpressionV2>
            </wsp:All>
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
                    <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                        <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                        <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${error.code}"/>
                        <L7p:Expression2 stringValue=""/>
                        <L7p:Negate booleanValue="true"/>
                        <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                        <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                            <L7p:item binary="included">
                                <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                                <L7p:Negated booleanValue="true"/>
                                <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                                <L7p:RightValue stringValue=""/>
                            </L7p:item>
                        </L7p:Predicates>
                    </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:SetVariable>
                        <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="MzY1"/>
                        <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="error.code"/>
                    </L7p:SetVariable>
                </wsp:OneOrMore>
                <L7p:Encapsulated>
                    <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="error code"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="error code is provided by previous assertion"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Properties>
                    </L7p:AssertionComment>
                    <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigGuid stringValue="56bd8147-3ab4-4d09-9460-8b2de02b7a9e"/>
                    <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigName stringValue="OTK Fail with error message"/>
                    <L7p:Parameters mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="apiPrefix"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue=""/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="givenErrorCode"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="${error.code}"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Parameters>
                </L7p:Encapsulated>
            </wsp:All>
            <L7p:assertionComment>
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="Lookup"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="Look up of the id_token associated with the client_id"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:assertionComment>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:Encapsulated>
                    <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigGuid stringValue="f330bc51-c1fb-44bd-a07a-93baf86adad2"/>
                    <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigName stringValue="OTK id_token Validation"/>
                    <L7p:Parameters mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="azp"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue=""/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="check_expiration"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="false"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="custom"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue=""/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="jwt"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="${id_token_hint}"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="resource_owner"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue=""/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="salt"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue=""/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="shared_secret"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue=""/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="shared_secret_alg"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue=""/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Parameters>
                </L7p:Encapsulated>
                <L7p:ResponseXpathAssertion>
                    <L7p:VariablePrefix stringValue="xpathJwt"/>
                    <L7p:XmlMsgSrc stringValue="resp"/>
                    <L7p:XpathExpression xpathExpressionValue="included">
                        <L7p:Expression stringValue="/ns0:validation/ns0:result='valid'"/>
                        <L7p:Namespaces mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="s"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="ns"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="http://ns.l7tech.com/2012/11/otk-tokenstore"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="ns0"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="http://ns.l7tech.com/2012/11/otk-ovp"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Namespaces>
                        <L7p:XpathVersion xpathVersion="XPATH_1_0"/>
                    </L7p:XpathExpression>
                </L7p:ResponseXpathAssertion>
                <L7p:ResponseXpathAssertion>
                    <L7p:VariablePrefix stringValue="xpathAud"/>
                    <L7p:XmlMsgSrc stringValue="resp"/>
                    <L7p:XpathExpression xpathExpressionValue="included">
                        <L7p:Expression stringValue="/ns0:validation/ns0:aud"/>
                        <L7p:Namespaces mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="s"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="ns"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="http://ns.l7tech.com/2012/11/otk-tokenstore"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="ns0"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="http://ns.l7tech.com/2012/11/otk-ovp"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Namespaces>
                        <L7p:XpathVersion xpathVersion="XPATH_1_0"/>
                    </L7p:XpathExpression>
                </L7p:ResponseXpathAssertion>
                <L7p:ResponseXpathAssertion>
                    <L7p:VariablePrefix stringValue="xpathAzp"/>
                    <L7p:XmlMsgSrc stringValue="resp"/>
                    <L7p:XpathExpression xpathExpressionValue="included">
                        <L7p:Expression stringValue="/ns0:validation/ns0:azp"/>
                        <L7p:Namespaces mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="s"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="ns"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="http://ns.l7tech.com/2012/11/otk-tokenstore"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="ns0"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="http://ns.l7tech.com/2012/11/otk-ovp"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Namespaces>
                        <L7p:XpathVersion xpathVersion="XPATH_1_0"/>
                    </L7p:XpathExpression>
                </L7p:ResponseXpathAssertion>
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="// The id_token within the id_token_hint should be issued to same client "/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Properties>
                    </L7p:AssertionComment>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${xpathAzp.result}"/>
                    <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="${client_id}"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item binary="included">
                            <L7p:RightValue stringValue="${client_id}"/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
                    <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                        <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${ciba_expired_id_token_enabled}"/>
                        <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="true"/>
                        <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                            <L7p:item binary="included">
                                <L7p:RightValue stringValue="true"/>
                            </L7p:item>
                        </L7p:Predicates>
                    </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                        <L7p:ResponseXpathAssertion>
                            <L7p:VariablePrefix stringValue="xpathExp"/>
                            <L7p:XmlMsgSrc stringValue="resp"/>
                            <L7p:XpathExpression xpathExpressionValue="included">
                                <L7p:Expression stringValue="/ns0:validation/ns0:expiration"/>
                                <L7p:Namespaces mapValue="included">
                                    <L7p:entry>
                                    <L7p:key stringValue="s"/>
                                    <L7p:value stringValue="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"/>
                                    </L7p:entry>
                                    <L7p:entry>
                                    <L7p:key stringValue="ns"/>

                    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Policy Fragment: #OTK DCR - Compose Request"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:Encapsulated>
            <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigGuid stringValue="72449a64-b6a3-4c06-aeec-686cd2d071a5"/>
            <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigName stringValue="OTK Software Statement Configuration"/>
            <L7p:Parameters mapValue="included">
                <L7p:entry>
                    <L7p:key stringValue="custom"/>
                    <L7p:value stringValue=""/>
                </L7p:entry>
            </L7p:Parameters>
        </L7p:Encapsulated>
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtkY3JfcGF5bG9hZH0="/>
            <L7p:ContentType stringValue="application/json; charset=utf-8"/>
            <L7p:DataType variableDataType="message"/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="dcr_request"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtzc2FfcGF5bG9hZH0="/>
            <L7p:ContentType stringValue="application/json; charset=utf-8"/>
            <L7p:DataType variableDataType="message"/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="ssa_request"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
        <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpressionV2>
                    <L7p:Expression stringValue="${redirect_uris_json_path}"/>
                    <L7p:OtherTargetMessageVariable stringValue="ssa_request"/>
                    <L7p:Target target="OTHER"/>
                    <L7p:VariablePrefix stringValue="ssa_redirect_uris"/>
                </L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpressionV2>
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${ssa_redirect_uris.found}"/>
                    <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="true"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item binary="included">
                            <L7p:RightValue stringValue="true"/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpressionV2>
                    <L7p:Expression stringValue="$.redirect_uris"/>
                    <L7p:OtherTargetMessageVariable stringValue="dcr_request"/>
                    <L7p:Target target="OTHER"/>
                    <L7p:VariablePrefix stringValue="dcr_redirect_uris"/>
                </L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpressionV2>
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${dcr_redirect_uris.found}"/>
                    <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="true"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item binary="included">
                            <L7p:RightValue stringValue="true"/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:ForEachLoop L7p:Usage="Required"
                    iterationLimit="100"
                    loopVariable="dcr_redirect_uris.results" variablePrefix="dcr_redirect_uri">
                    <L7p:SetVariable>
                        <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="ZmFsc2U="/>
                        <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="redirect_uri_found"/>
                    </L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:SetVariable>
                        <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="ZmFsc2U="/>
                        <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="ssa_redirect_uri.break"/>
                    </L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:ForEachLoop L7p:Usage="Required"
                        loopVariable="ssa_redirect_uris.results" variablePrefix="ssa_redirect_uri">
                        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
                            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${dcr_redirect_uri.current}"/>
                                    <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="${ssa_redirect_uri.current}"/>
                                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                                    <L7p:item binary="included">
                                    <L7p:RightValue stringValue="${ssa_redirect_uri.current}"/>
                                    </L7p:item>
                                    </L7p:Predicates>
                                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                                <L7p:SetVariable>
                                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="dHJ1ZQ=="/>
                                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="redirect_uri_found"/>
                                </L7p:SetVariable>
                                <L7p:SetVariable>
                                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="dHJ1ZQ=="/>
                                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="ssa_redirect_uri.break"/>
                                </L7p:SetVariable>
                            </wsp:All>
                            <L7p:TrueAssertion/>
                        </wsp:OneOrMore>
                    </L7p:ForEachLoop>
                    <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
                        <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                            <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${redirect_uri_found}"/>
                            <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="true"/>
                            <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                                <L7p:item binary="included">
                                    <L7p:RightValue stringValue="true"/>
                                </L7p:item>
                            </L7p:Predicates>
                        </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                        <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                            <L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
                                <L7p:Detail stringValue="DCR redirect_uris '${dcr_redirect_uris.result}' is not sub-set or equal to SSA redirect uris '${ssa_redirect_uris.result}'"/>
                                <L7p:Level stringValue="WARNING"/>
                            </L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
                            <L7p:Encapsulated>
                                <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                                    <L7p:entry>
                                    <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                                    <L7p:value stringValue="317"/>
                                    </L7p:entry>
                                    </L7p:Properties>
                                </L7p:AssertionComment>
                                <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigGuid stringValue="56bd8147-3ab4-4d09-9460-8b2de02b7a9e"/>
                                <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigName stringValue="OTK Fail with error message"/>
                                <L7p:Parameters mapValue="included">
                                    <L7p:entry>
                                    <L7p:key stringValue="apiPrefix"/>
                                    <L7p:value stringValue=""/>
                                    </L7p:entry>
                                    <L7p:entry>
                                    <L7p:key stringValue="custom"/>
                                    <L7p:value stringValue=""/>
                                    </L7p:entry>
                                    <L7p:entry>
                                    <L7p:key stringValue="givenErrorCode"/>
                                    <L7p:value stringValue="317"/>
                                    </L7p:entry>
                                </L7p:Parameters>
                            </L7p:Encapsulated>
                        </wsp:All>
                    </wsp:OneOrMore>
                </L7p:ForEachLoop>
                <L7p:assertionComment>
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="Redirect uri"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValueReference="inline"><![CDATA[//MUST match or be a subset of the software_redirect_uris claim in the SSA
                If omitted,  the entire contents of the software_redirect_uris element in the SSA are considered to be requested.]]></L7p:value>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:assertionComment>
            </wsp:All>
            <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
                <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                    <L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpressionV2>
                        <L7p:Expression stringValue="$.scope"/>
                        <L7p:OtherTargetMessageVariable stringValue="dcr_request"/>
                        <L7p:Target target="OTHER"/>
                        <L7p:VariablePrefix stringValue="dcr_scopes"/>
                    </L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpressionV2>
                    <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                        <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${dcr_scopes.found}"/>
                        <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="true"/>
                        <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                            <L7p:item binary="included">
                                <L7p:RightValue stringValue="true"/>
                            </L7p:item>
                        </L7p:Predicates>
                    </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                        <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                        <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${dcr_scopes.result}"/>
                        <L7p:Operator operatorNull="null"/>
                        <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                            <L7p:item regex="included">
                                <L7p:Pattern stringValue=".*(?:^|\W)openid(?:$|\W).*"/>
                            </L7p:item>
                        </L7p:Predicates>
                    </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:assertionComment>
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="Success"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="//Minimum scope should be openid"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Properties>
                    </L7p:assertionComment>
                </wsp:All>
                <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                    <L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
                        <L7p:Detail stringValue="Invalid scopes '${dcr_scopes.result}'. Must have openid"/>
                        <L7p:Level stringValue="WARNING"/>
                    </L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
                    <L7p:Encapsulated>
                        <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                            <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                                <L7p:entry>
                                    <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                                    <L7p:value stringValue="319"/>
                                </L7p:entry>
                            </L7p:Properties>
                        </L7p:AssertionComment>
                        <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigGuid stringValue="56bd8147-3ab4-4d09-9460-8b2de02b7a9e"/>
                        <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigName stringValue="OTK Fail with error message"/>
                        <L7p:Parameters mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="apiPrefix"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue=""/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="custom"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue=""/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="givenErrorCode"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="319"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Parameters>
                    </L7p:Encapsulated>
                    <L7p:assertionComment>
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="Error"/>

                        <L7p:value stringValue=""/>

                        <L7p:key stringValue="custom"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue=""/>

                    <L7p:entry>

                        <L7p:assertionComment>

                                    <L7p:value stringValue="error"/>

                    <L7p:assertionComment>
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>

                                <L7p:value stringValue="encrypt"/>

            </wsp:All>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>

        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:SetVariable>

            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="authz_response_jwt"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>

</wsp:Policy>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue=""/>
            <L7p:ContentType stringValue="text/plain; charset=UTF-8"/>
            <L7p:DataType variableDataType="message"/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="req"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
        <L7p:HttpRoutingAssertion>
            <L7p:CurrentSecurityHeaderHandling intValue="3"/>
            <L7p:FailOnErrorStatus booleanValue="false"/>
            <L7p:HttpMethod httpMethod="GET"/>
            <L7p:ProtectedServiceUrl stringValue="${http_url}"/>
            <L7p:RequestHeaderRules httpPassthroughRuleSet="included">
                <L7p:Rules httpPassthroughRules="included"/>
            </L7p:RequestHeaderRules>
            <L7p:RequestMsgSrc stringValue="req"/>
            <L7p:RequestParamRules httpPassthroughRuleSet="included">
                <L7p:ForwardAll booleanValue="true"/>
                <L7p:Rules httpPassthroughRules="included"/>
            </L7p:RequestParamRules>
            <L7p:ResponseHeaderRules httpPassthroughRuleSet="included">
                <L7p:ForwardAll booleanValue="true"/>
                <L7p:Rules httpPassthroughRules="included">
                    <L7p:item httpPassthroughRule="included">
                        <L7p:Name stringValue="Set-Cookie"/>
                    </L7p:item>
                </L7p:Rules>
            </L7p:ResponseHeaderRules>
            <L7p:ResponseMsgDest stringValue="resp"/>
            <L7p:SamlAssertionVersion intValue="2"/>
        </L7p:HttpRoutingAssertion>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${httpRouting.reasonCode}"/>
                <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="400"/>
                <L7p:Operator operator="LT"/>
                <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                    <L7p:item binary="included">
                        <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                        <L7p:Operator operator="LT"/>
                        <L7p:RightValue stringValue="400"/>
                    </L7p:item>
                </L7p:Predicates>
            </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
                    <L7p:Detail stringValue="HTTP Routing (GET ${http_url}) failed with the status=${httpRouting.reasonCode}"/>
                </L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="MzA2"/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="error.code"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:FalseAssertion/>
                <L7p:assertionComment>
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="error"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:assertionComment>
            </wsp:All>
            <L7p:assertionComment>
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="routing errors"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:assertionComment>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>

<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">

                            <L7p:value stringValue="error"/>

            <L7p:assertionComment>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="==== Use ${jwt_hint} value for custom validation logic"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:DecodeJsonWebToken>
            <L7p:FailUnverifiedSignature booleanValue="true"/>
            <L7p:KeyId stringValue="${kid}"/>
            <L7p:KeyType stringValue="JSON Web Key Set"/>
            <L7p:PrivateKeySource stringValue="${jwks}"/>
            <L7p:SourcePayload stringValue="${jwt}"/>
            <L7p:TargetVariablePrefix stringValue="decoded_jwt"/>
            <L7p:ValidationType stringValue="Using Recipient Key From Context Variable"/>
        </L7p:DecodeJsonWebToken>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${check_expiry}"/>
                <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="true"/>
                <L7p:Negate booleanValue="true"/>
                <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                    <L7p:item binary="included">
                        <L7p:Negated booleanValue="true"/>
                        <L7p:RightValue stringValue="true"/>
                    </L7p:item>
                </L7p:Predicates>
            </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtkZWNvZGVkX2p3dC5wYXlsb2FkfQ=="/>
                    <L7p:ContentType stringValue="application/json; charset=utf-8"/>
                    <L7p:DataType variableDataType="message"/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="jwt_msg"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpressionV2>
                    <L7p:Expression stringValue="$.exp"/>
                    <L7p:OtherTargetMessageVariable stringValue="jwt_msg"/>
                    <L7p:Target target="OTHER"/>
                    <L7p:VariablePrefix stringValue="jwt_exp_path"/>
                </L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpressionV2>
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtqd3RfZXhwX3BhdGgucmVzdWx0fQ=="/>
                    <L7p:DataType variableDataType="int"/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="exp"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${exp}"/>
                    <L7p:Operator operatorNull="null"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item dataType="included">
                            <L7p:Type variableDataType="int"/>
                        </L7p:item>
                        <L7p:item binary="included">
                            <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                            <L7p:Operator operator="GT"/>
                            <L7p:RightValue stringValue="${gateway.time.seconds}"/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
            </wsp:All>
            <L7p:assertionComment>
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="~ check expiry"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:assertionComment>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtkZWNvZGVkX2p3dC5wYXlsb2FkfQ=="/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="jwt_payload"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtkZWNvZGVkX2p3dC5oZWFkZXJ9"/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="jwt_header"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Policy Fragment: #OTK Lookup JWT Request Object"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Target policy: OTK Lookup JWT Request Object"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Customize this policy to add http routing checks"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue=""/>
            <L7p:ContentType stringValue="text/plain; charset=UTF-8"/>
            <L7p:DataType variableDataType="message"/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="sourceMessage"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
        <L7p:HttpRoutingAssertion>
            <L7p:CurrentSecurityHeaderHandling intValue="3"/>
            <L7p:FailOnErrorStatus booleanValue="false"/>
            <L7p:HttpMethod httpMethod="GET"/>
            <L7p:ProtectedServiceUrl stringValue="${request_uri}"/>
            <L7p:RequestHeaderRules httpPassthroughRuleSet="included">
                <L7p:Rules httpPassthroughRules="included"/>
            </L7p:RequestHeaderRules>
            <L7p:RequestMsgSrc stringValue="sourceMessage"/>
            <L7p:RequestParamRules httpPassthroughRuleSet="included">
                <L7p:ForwardAll booleanValue="true"/>
                <L7p:Rules httpPassthroughRules="included"/>
            </L7p:RequestParamRules>
            <L7p:ResponseHeaderRules httpPassthroughRuleSet="included">
                <L7p:ForwardAll booleanValue="true"/>
                <L7p:Rules httpPassthroughRules="included">
                    <L7p:item httpPassthroughRule="included">
                        <L7p:Name stringValue="Set-Cookie"/>
                    </L7p:item>
                </L7p:Rules>
            </L7p:ResponseHeaderRules>
            <L7p:ResponseMsgDest stringValue="resp"/>
            <L7p:ResponseSize stringValue="524288"/>
            <L7p:SamlAssertionVersion intValue="2"/>
        </L7p:HttpRoutingAssertion>
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtyZXNwLmh0dHAuaGVhZGVyLngtY2EtZXJyfQ=="/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="error.code"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${httpRouting.reasonCode}"/>
                <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="500"/>
                <L7p:Operator operator="LT"/>
                <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                    <L7p:item binary="included">
                        <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                        <L7p:Operator operator="LT"/>
                        <L7p:RightValue stringValue="500"/>
                    </L7p:item>
                </L7p:Predicates>
            </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
            <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${error.code}"/>
                <L7p:Expression2 stringValue=""/>
                <L7p:Negate booleanValue="true"/>
                <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                    <L7p:item binary="included">
                        <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                        <L7p:Negated booleanValue="true"/>
                        <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                        <L7p:RightValue stringValue=""/>
                    </L7p:item>
                </L7p:Predicates>
            </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
                    <L7p:Detail stringValue="routing failed!"/>
                </L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="error code"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="set error code to 000"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Properties>
                    </L7p:AssertionComment>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="MDAw"/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="error.code"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:FalseAssertion/>
            </wsp:All>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${error.code}"/>
                <L7p:Expression2 stringValue=""/>
                <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                    <L7p:item binary="included">
                        <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                        <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                        <L7p:RightValue stringValue=""/>
                    </L7p:item>
                </L7p:Predicates>
            </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:Regex>
                    <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="capture"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="capture the last 3 digits"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Properties>
                    </L7p:AssertionComment>
                    <L7p:AutoTarget booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:OtherTargetMessageVariable stringValue="error.code"/>
                    <L7p:Regex stringValue="(\d{0,16})(\d{3})$"/>
                    <L7p:Replace booleanValue="true"/>
                    <L7p:Replacement stringValue="$2"/>
                    <L7p:Target target="OTHER"/>
                </L7p:Regex>
                <L7p:FalseAssertion/>
            </wsp:All>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>
