policies.name: #OTK Refresh Token Validation Grant Type Check Override

policy.xml:
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Policy Fragment: #OTK Refresh Token Validation Grant Type Check Override"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpressionV2>
                <L7p:Evaluator stringValue="JsonPath"/>
                <L7p:Expression stringValue="$.otk.original_grant_type"/>
                <L7p:OtherTargetMessageVariable stringValue="token_custom"/>
                <L7p:Target target="OTHER"/>
                <L7p:VariablePrefix stringValue="original_grant_type"/>
            </L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpressionV2>
            <L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpressionV2>
                <L7p:Evaluator stringValue="JsonPath"/>
                <L7p:Expression stringValue="$.otk.grant_type"/>
                <L7p:OtherTargetMessageVariable stringValue="token_custom"/>
                <L7p:Target target="OTHER"/>
                <L7p:VariablePrefix stringValue="original_grant_type"/>
            </L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpressionV2>
            <L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpressionV2>
                <L7p:Evaluator stringValue="JsonPath"/>
                <L7p:Expression stringValue="$.client_custom.grant_type"/>
                <L7p:OtherTargetMessageVariable stringValue="token_custom"/>
                <L7p:Target target="OTHER"/>
                <L7p:VariablePrefix stringValue="original_grant_type"/>
            </L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpressionV2>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtvcmlnaW5hbF9ncmFudF90eXBlLnJlc3VsdH0="/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="original_grant_type"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Policy Fragment: #OTK Replay Attack Protection"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Protect against replay attack using either cache or database."/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="** Using Cache is better for performance especially if it is just a signle node "/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="** However in case of multi-node cluster, database might be required"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="====================================="/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Configure cache lifetime to be used for caching assertions below."/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Recommended that cache lifetime is not too big"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="For JWTs, your cache lifetime needs to be greater than the JWT's expiry"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="MzAw"/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="cache_lifetime"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="// initiailize"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:AssertionComment>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue=""/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="error.code"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:Encapsulated>
                    <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigGuid stringValue="68ad78a1-f4a1-4568-91e1-0980d95c75cd"/>
                    <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigName stringValue="OTK Cache Look Up"/>
                    <L7p:Parameters mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="cacheID"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="${cacheId}"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="cacheKey"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="${identifier}"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="maxEntryAge"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="${cache_lifetime}"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Parameters>
                </L7p:Encapsulated>
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="// request is a replay"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Properties>
                    </L7p:AssertionComment>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="MzA3"/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="error.code"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:assertionComment>
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="Existing"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="// fail"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:assertionComment>
            </wsp:All>
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="PD94bWwgdmVyc2lvbj0iMS4wIiBlbmNvZGluZz0iVVRGLTgiPz4NCjx2YWx1ZXMgeG1sbnM9Imh0dHA6Ly9ucy5sN3RlY2guY29tLzIwMTIvMTEvb3RrLWNsaWVudHN0b3JlIj4NCiAgPGlkPjwhW0NEQVRBWyR7aWRlbnRpZmllcn1dXT48L2lkPg0KICA8ZXhwaXJhdGlvbj48IVtDREFUQVske2V4cH1dXT48L2V4cGlyYXRpb24+DQo8L3ZhbHVlcz4="/>
                    <L7p:ContentType stringValue="text/xml; charset=utf-8"/>
                    <L7p:DataType variableDataType="message"/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="resp"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:Encapsulated>
                    <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigGuid stringValue="e5ee8bcf-1796-4297-88dd-c838031a6f6a"/>
                    <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigName stringValue="OTK Cache Store"/>
                    <L7p:Parameters mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="cacheID"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="${cacheId}"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="cacheKey"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="${identifier}"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="doNotCacheSoapFaults"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="true"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="maxEntries"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="10000"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="maxEntryAge"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="${cache_lifetime}"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="maxEntrySize"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="100000"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="msg"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="resp"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Parameters>
                </L7p:Encapsulated>
                <L7p:assertionComment>
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="New"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="// add entry"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:assertionComment>
            </wsp:All>
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
                    <L7p:Detail stringValue="Replay protection could not be applied for identifier '${identifier}'. Original error_code: '${error.code}'!"/>
                </L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="// replay attack protection could not be applied"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Properties>
                    </L7p:AssertionComment>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="MzA4"/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="error.code"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:assertionComment>
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="Error"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="// failed to apply replay attack protection"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:assertionComment>
            </wsp:All>
            <L7p:assertionComment>
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="Action"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="// Use cache to keep track of entry"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:assertionComment>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${error.code}"/>
                <L7p:Expression2 stringValue=""/>
                <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                    <L7p:item binary="included">
                        <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                        <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                        <L7p:RightValue stringValue=""/>
                    </L7p:item>
                </L7p:Predicates>
            </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
            <L7p:FalseAssertion/>
            <L7p:assertionComment>
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="// check for error"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:assertionComment>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Policy Fragment: #OTK SMSession User Credentials"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="This policy reads smsession cookie from the request and sets the next auth flow action"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="This policy can be customized to read smsession with different name and not bypass consent by setting bypass_consent to none"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${action}"/>
                    <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="display"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item binary="included">
                            <L7p:RightValue stringValue="display"/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtyZXF1ZXN0Lmh0dHAuY29va2lldmFsdWVzLnNtc2Vzc2lvbn0="/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="smsession_cookie"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${smsession_cookie}"/>
                    <L7p:Expression2 stringValue=""/>
                    <L7p:Negate booleanValue="true"/>
                    <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item binary="included">
                            <L7p:Negated booleanValue="true"/>
                            <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                            <L7p:RightValue stringValue=""/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
                    <L7p:Detail stringValue="smsession_cookie found : ${smsession_cookie}"/>
                    <L7p:Level stringValue="FINE"/>
                </L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="// smsession found, bypass display form and authentication"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Properties>
                    </L7p:AssertionComment>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="c21fbG9naW4="/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="sm_action"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="// smsession found, bypass consent"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Properties>
                    </L7p:AssertionComment>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="Z3JhbnQ="/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="bypass_consent"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:assertionComment>
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="//Bypass display of the login screen"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:assertionComment>
            </wsp:All>
            <L7p:TrueAssertion>
                <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="// Never fail, continue with display"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:AssertionComment>
            </L7p:TrueAssertion>
            <L7p:assertionComment>
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="// Check for SMSession"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:assertionComment>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Policy Fragment: #OTK Session DB Lookup Cache"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Target policy:  OTK session DB"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="The main purpose is to provide additional flexibility for session cache lookup"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Add Stop Processing assertion to ignore cache lookup"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
            <L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue=""/>
                <L7p:ContentType stringValue="text/xml;charset=UTF-8"/>
                <L7p:DataType variableDataType="message"/>
                <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="resp"/>
            </L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:Encapsulated>
                <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigGuid stringValue="68ad78a1-f4a1-4568-91e1-0980d95c75cd"/>
                <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigName stringValue="OTK Cache Look Up"/>
                <L7p:Parameters mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="cacheID"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="${cacheId}"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="cacheKey"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="${cacheKey}"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="maxAcceptableAge"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="${cacheAge}"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="maxEntryAge"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="${cacheAge}"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Parameters>
            </L7p:Encapsulated>
            <L7p:EncodeDecode>
                <L7p:SourceVariableName stringValue="resp.mainpart"/>
                <L7p:TargetDataType variableDataType="string"/>
                <L7p:TargetVariableName stringValue="encoded"/>
                <L7p:TransformType transformType="URL_ENCODE"/>
            </L7p:EncodeDecode>
            <L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="PGZvdW5kIHhtbG5zPSJodHRwOi8vbnMubDd0ZWNoLmNvbS8yMDEyLzExL290ay1zZXNzaW9uIj4NCiAgPHZhbHVlPiR7ZW5jb2RlZH08L3ZhbHVlPg0KICA8bG9jYXRpb24+Y2FjaGU8L2xvY2F0aW9uPg0KPC9mb3VuZD4="/>
                <L7p:ContentType stringValue="text/xml;charset=UTF-8"/>
                <L7p:DataType variableDataType="message"/>
                <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="resp"/>
            </L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:assertionComment>
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="Check cache"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:assertionComment>
        </wsp:All>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Policy Fragment: #OTK Include Interaction Id"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="This policy adds x-fapi-interaction-id  to response header id FAPI is enabled in OTK"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="This policy can be included within the resources which require FAPI "/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="The OTK demo resource has this fragment included as an example"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="A user defined FAPI Interaction ID can also be set within ${fapiInteractionId}. "/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="The value ${fapiInteractionId} can either set in the calling resource or within this Customization"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtzZXNzaW9uLmN1c3RvbX0="/>
            <L7p:ContentType stringValue="application/json; charset=utf-8"/>
            <L7p:DataType variableDataType="message"/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="customKeyJson"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpressionV2>
                    <L7p:Expression stringValue="clientkey.client_key_custom"/>
                    <L7p:OtherTargetMessageVariable stringValue="customKeyJson"/>
                    <L7p:Target target="OTHER"/>
                    <L7p:VariablePrefix stringValue="clientKeyCustom"/>
                </L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpressionV2>
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtjbGllbnRLZXlDdXN0b20ucmVzdWx0fQ=="/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="client_key_custom"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
            </wsp:All>
            <L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue=""/>
                <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="client_key_custom"/>
            </L7p:SetVariable>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
        <L7p:Encapsulated>
            <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigGuid stringValue="355ca731-f92a-4d64-b41a-8533eedfa651"/>
            <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigName stringValue="OTK Profile Configuration"/>
            <L7p:Parameters mapValue="included">
                <L7p:entry>
                    <L7p:key stringValue="client_id"/>
                    <L7p:value stringValue="${session.client_id}"/>
                </L7p:entry>
                <L7p:entry>
                    <L7p:key stringValue="client_key_custom"/>
                    <L7p:value stringValue="${client_key_custom}"/>
                </L7p:entry>
                <L7p:entry>
                    <L7p:key stringValue="custom"/>
                    <L7p:value stringValue=""/>
                </L7p:entry>
            </L7p:Parameters>
        </L7p:Encapsulated>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${oauth2_profile.fapi_baseline}"/>
                <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="false"/>
                <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                    <L7p:item binary="included">
                        <L7p:RightValue stringValue="false"/>
                    </L7p:item>
                </L7p:Predicates>
            </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
                    <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                        <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${fapiInteractionId}"/>
                        <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="false"/>
                        <L7p:Negate booleanValue="true"/>
                        <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                        <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                            <L7p:item binary="included">
                                <L7p:Negated booleanValue="true"/>
                                <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                                <L7p:RightValue stringValue="false"/>
                            </L7p:item>
                        </L7p:Predicates>
                    </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                        <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                            <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${request.http.header.x-fapi-interaction-id}"/>
                            <L7p:Expression2 stringValue=""/>
                            <L7p:Negate booleanValue="true"/>
                            <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                            <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                                <L7p:item binary="included">
                                    <L7p:Negated booleanValue="true"/>
                                    <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                                    <L7p:RightValue stringValue=""/>
                                </L7p:item>
                            </L7p:Predicates>
                        </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                        <L7p:SetVariable>
                            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtyZXF1ZXN0Lmh0dHAuaGVhZGVyLngtZmFwaS1pbnRlcmFjdGlvbi1pZH0="/>
                            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="fapiInteractionId"/>
                        </L7p:SetVariable>
                    </wsp:All>
                    <L7p:UUIDGenerator>
                        <L7p:TargetVariable stringValue="fapiInteractionId"/>
                    </L7p:UUIDGenerator>
                </wsp:OneOrMore>
                <L7p:AddHeader>
                    <L7p:HeaderName stringValue="x-fapi-interaction-id"/>
                    <L7p:HeaderValue stringValue="${fapiInteractionId}"/>
                    <L7p:Target target="RESPONSE"/>
                </L7p:AddHeader>
                <L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
                    <L7p:Detail stringValue="The x-fapi-interaction-id is ${response.http.header.x-fapi-interaction-id}"/>
                    <L7p:LoggingOnly booleanValue="true"/>
                </L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
            </wsp:All>
            <L7p:assertionComment>
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="// add x-fapi-interaction-id header if fapi is enabled"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:assertionComment>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>

<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Policy Fragment: #OTK Third Party Authentication"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="***************************************************************"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Initializes an OAuth 2.0 authentication flow"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Input:"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="    'client_id' - The client id."/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="    'state' - SessionID"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Output:"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="    'code' - authorization_code"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="***************************************************************"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:Include>
            <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="Retrieve third-party OIDC configuration"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:AssertionComment>
            <L7p:Enabled booleanValue="false"/>
            <L7p:PolicyGuid stringValue="a45e324c-eb67-43fc-81da-c34c16937214"/>
            <L7p:PolicyName stringValue="#OTK Third Party Configuration"/>
        </L7p:Include>
        <L7p:Encapsulated>
            <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="//socialLoginAuthorizeCache"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:AssertionComment>
            <L7p:Enabled booleanValue="false"/>
            <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigGuid stringValue="dd360775-0fec-47db-8b45-059d995b262d"/>
            <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigName stringValue="OTK Session - Store"/>
            <L7p:Parameters mapValue="included">
                <L7p:entry>
                    <L7p:key stringValue="cacheAge"/>
                    <L7p:value stringValue="300"/>
                </L7p:entry>
                <L7p:entry>
                    <L7p:key stringValue="cacheId"/>
                    <L7p:value stringValue="socialLoginAuthorizeCache"/>
                </L7p:entry>
                <L7p:entry>
                    <L7p:key stringValue="cacheKey"/>
                    <L7p:value stringValue="${sessionID[0]}"/>
                </L7p:entry>
                <L7p:entry>
                    <L7p:key stringValue="cacheMaxEntries"/>
                    <L7p:value stringValue="10000"/>
                </L7p:entry>
                <L7p:entry>
                    <L7p:key stringValue="cacheMaxSize"/>
                    <L7p:value stringValue="10000"/>
                </L7p:entry>
                <L7p:entry>
                    <L7p:key stringValue="custom"/>
                    <L7p:value stringValue=""/>
                </L7p:entry>
                <L7p:entry>
                    <L7p:key stringValue="dbAge"/>
                    <L7p:value stringValue="300"/>
                </L7p:entry>
                <L7p:entry>
                    <L7p:key stringValue="value"/>
                    <L7p:value stringValue="${jwt_session.compact}"/>
                </L7p:entry>
            </L7p:Parameters>
        </L7p:Encapsulated>
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="// Compose the third party OIDC authrorization request URL; Use ${sessionID[0]} for state parameter."/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:AssertionComment>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHt0aGlyZF9wYXJ0eV9vaWRjLmF1dGhvcml6YXRpb25fZW5kcG9pbnR9P3Jlc3BvbnNlX3R5cGU9Y29kZSZjbGllbnRfaWQ9JHt0aGlyZF9wYXJ0eV9vaWRjLmNsaWVudF9pZH0mc2NvcGU9JHt0aGlyZF9wYXJ0eV9vaWRjLnNjb3BlX2VuY29kZWR9JnN0YXRlPSR7c2Vzc2lvbklEWzBdfSZyZWRpcmVjdF91cmk9JHt0aGlyZF9wYXJ0eV9vaWRjLnJlZGlyZWN0X3VyaV9lbmNvZGVkfQ=="/>
            <L7p:Enabled booleanValue="false"/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="third_party_oidc_request_url"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
        <L7p:AddHeader>
            <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="Override the Location header"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:AssertionComment>
            <L7p:Enabled booleanValue="false"/>
            <L7p:HeaderName stringValue="Location"/>
            <L7p:HeaderValue stringValue="${third_party_oidc_request_url}"/>
            <L7p:RemoveExisting booleanValue="true"/>
            <L7p:Target target="RESPONSE"/>
        </L7p:AddHeader>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Policy Fragment: #OTK Third Party Configuration"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="***************************************************************"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Request OIDC endpoints"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="URL: https://<THIRD_PARTY_OIDC>/.well-known/openid-configuration"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Ex: SSP OIDC URL :  'https://<SSP_OIDC_HOST>/default/.well-known/openid-configuration'"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Ex: Google OIDC URL 'https://accounts.google.com/.well-known/openid-configuration'"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue=" "/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Store 'third_party_oidc.client_id' and 'third_party_oidc.client_secret' securely in Stored Passwords and refer via context variable ${secpass.<name>.plaintext}"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue=" "/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Output:"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="    {"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="         "authorization_endpoint": "<Authorization URL>""/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="         "token_endpoint": "<Token URL>""/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="         "userinfo_endpoint": "<User Info URL>""/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="    }"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="***************************************************************"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="// third party OIDC provider name (Ex: SSP, Google)"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:AssertionComment>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="VEhJUkRfUEFSVFlfT0lEQ19QUk9WSURFUg=="/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="third_party_oidc_provider"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="VEhJUkRfUEFSVFlfT0lEQy8ud2VsbC1rbm93bi9vcGVuaWQtY29uZmlndXJhdGlvbg=="/>
            <L7p:Enabled booleanValue="false"/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="third_party_oidc_discovery_url"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
        <wsp:OneOrMore L7p:Enabled="false" wsp:Usage="Required">
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:CacheLookup>
                    <L7p:CacheEntryKey stringValue="${third_party_oidc_discovery_url}"/>
                    <L7p:CacheId stringValue="third_party_oidc_configuration"/>
                    <L7p:ContentTypeOverride stringValue=""/>
                    <L7p:OtherTargetMessageVariable stringValue="oidc_config"/>
                    <L7p:Target target="OTHER"/>
                </L7p:CacheLookup>
            </wsp:All>
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:HttpRoutingAssertion>
                    <L7p:HttpMethod httpMethod="GET"/>
                    <L7p:ProtectedServiceUrl stringValue="${third_party_oidc_discovery_url}"/>
                    <L7p:RequestHeaderRules httpPassthroughRuleSet="included">
                        <L7p:ForwardAll booleanValue="true"/>
                        <L7p:Rules httpPassthroughRules="included">
                            <L7p:item httpPassthroughRule="included">
                                <L7p:Name stringValue="Cookie"/>
                            </L7p:item>
                            <L7p:item httpPassthroughRule="included">
                                <L7p:Name stringValue="SOAPAction"/>
                            </L7p:item>
                        </L7p:Rules>
                    </L7p:RequestHeaderRules>
                    <L7p:RequestParamRules httpPassthroughRuleSet="included">
                        <L7p:ForwardAll booleanValue="true"/>
                        <L7p:Rules httpPassthroughRules="included"/>
                    </L7p:RequestParamRules>
                    <L7p:ResponseHeaderRules httpPassthroughRuleSet="included">
                        <L7p:ForwardAll booleanValue="true"/>
                        <L7p:Rules httpPassthroughRules="included">
                            <L7p:item httpPassthroughRule="included">
                                <L7p:Name stringValue="Set-Cookie"/>
                            </L7p:item>
                        </L7p:Rules>
                    </L7p:ResponseHeaderRules>
                    <L7p:ResponseMsgDest stringValue="oidc_config"/>
                    <L7p:SamlAssertionVersion intValue="2"/>
                </L7p:HttpRoutingAssertion>
                <L7p:CacheStorage>
                    <L7p:CacheEntryKey stringValue="${third_party_oidc_discovery_url}"/>
                    <L7p:CacheId stringValue="third_party_oidc_configuration"/>
                    <L7p:OtherTargetMessageVariable stringValue="oidc_config"/>
                    <L7p:Target target="OTHER"/>
                </L7p:CacheStorage>
            </wsp:All>
            <L7p:assertionComment>
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="Retrieve third party OIDC configuration"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:assertionComment>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
        <L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpressionV2>
            <L7p:Enabled booleanValue="false"/>
            <L7p:Expression stringValue="authorization_endpoint"/>
            <L7p:OtherTargetMessageVariable stringValue="oidc_config"/>
            <L7p:Target target="OTHER"/>
            <L7p:VariablePrefix stringValue="oidc_authorization"/>
        </L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpressionV2>
        <L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpressionV2>
            <L7p:Enabled booleanValue="false"/>
            <L7p:Expression stringValue="token_endpoint"/>
            <L7p:OtherTargetMessageVariable stringValue="oidc_config"/>
            <L7p:Target target="OTHER"/>
            <L7p:VariablePrefix stringValue="oidc_token"/>
        </L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpressionV2>
        <L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpressionV2>
            <L7p:Enabled booleanValue="false"/>
            <L7p:Expression stringValue="userinfo_endpoint"/>
            <L7p:OtherTargetMessageVariable stringValue="oidc_config"/>
            <L7p:Target target="OTHER"/>
            <L7p:VariablePrefix stringValue="oidc_userinfo"/>
        </L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpressionV2>
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtvaWRjX2F1dGhvcml6YXRpb24ucmVzdWx0fQ=="/>
            <L7p:Enabled booleanValue="false"/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="third_party_oidc.authorization_endpoint"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtvaWRjX3Rva2VuLnJlc3VsdH0="/>
            <L7p:Enabled booleanValue="false"/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="third_party_oidc.token_endpoint"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtvaWRjX3VzZXJpbmZvLnJlc3VsdH0="/>
            <L7p:Enabled booleanValue="false"/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="third_party_oidc.introspect_endpoint"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="Customize scope for the third party OIDC authorization flow"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:AssertionComment>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="b3BlbmlkIHByb2ZpbGUgZW1haWw="/>
            <L7p:Enabled booleanValue="false"/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="third_party_oidc.scope"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="Retrieve third party OIDC client_id (either hard code the value here, or use OTK client custom column)"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:AssertionComment>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="VEhJUkRfUEFSVFlfT0lEQ19DTElFTlRfSUQ="/>
            <L7p:Enabled booleanValue="false"/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="third_party_oidc.client_id"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="Retrieve third party OIDC client_secret (DO NOT hard-code the value here, try retrieving it from secure passwords, i.e., ${secpass.third_party_oidc_client_secret.plaintext})"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:AssertionComment>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="VEhJUkRfUEFSVFlfQ0xJRU5UX1NFQ1JFVA=="/>
            <L7p:Enabled booleanValue="false"/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="third_party_oidc.client_secret"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="Ensure, the redirection from the third party OIDC happens to the OTK authorization login endpoint"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:AssertionComment>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="aHR0cHM6Ly8ke2dhdGV3YXkuY2x1c3Rlci5ob3N0bmFtZX06JHtnYXRld2F5Lm90ay5wb3J0fS9hdXRoL29hdXRoL3YyL2F1dGhvcml6ZS9sb2dpbg=="/>
            <L7p:Enabled booleanValue="false"/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="third_party_oidc.redirect_uri"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
        <L7p:EncodeDecode>
            <L7p:Enabled booleanValue="false"/>
            <L7p:SourceVariableName stringValue="third_party_oidc.scope"/>
            <L7p:TargetDataType variableDataType="string"/>
            <L7p:TargetVariableName stringValue="third_party_oidc.scope_encoded"/>
            <L7p:TransformType transformType="URL_ENCODE"/>
        </L7p:EncodeDecode>
        <L7p:EncodeDecode>
            <L7p:Enabled booleanValue="false"/>
            <L7p:SourceVariableName stringValue="third_party_oidc.redirect_uri"/>
            <L7p:TargetDataType variableDataType="string"/>
            <L7p:TargetVariableName stringValue="third_party_oidc.redirect_uri_encoded"/>
            <L7p:TransformType transformType="URL_ENCODE"/>
        </L7p:EncodeDecode>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>

policies.name: #OTK Third Party Login Auth Code Verification

policy.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Policy Fragment: #OTK Third Party Login Auth Code Verification"/>
            <L7p:Enabled booleanValue="false"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="***************************************************************"/>
            <L7p:Enabled booleanValue="false"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Verify authorization_code by requesting a access_token."/>
            <L7p:Enabled booleanValue="false"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Input:"/>
            <L7p:Enabled booleanValue="false"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="    'code' - Authorization code."/>
            <L7p:Enabled booleanValue="false"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="    'client_id' - third_party_oidc.client_id"/>
            <L7p:Enabled booleanValue="false"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="    'client_secret' - third_party_oidc.client_secret"/>
            <L7p:Enabled booleanValue="false"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Output:"/>
            <L7p:Enabled booleanValue="false"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="    {"/>
            <L7p:Enabled booleanValue="false"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="         "access_token": "string""/>
            <L7p:Enabled booleanValue="false"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="         "id_token": "string""/>
            <L7p:Enabled booleanValue="false"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="    }"/>
            <L7p:Enabled booleanValue="false"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="***************************************************************"/>
            <L7p:Enabled booleanValue="false"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
            <L7p:Enabled booleanValue="false"/>
            <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${code}"/>
            <L7p:Expression2 stringValue=""/>
            <L7p:Negate booleanValue="true"/>
            <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
            <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                <L7p:item binary="included">
                    <L7p:Negated booleanValue="true"/>
                    <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                    <L7p:RightValue stringValue=""/>
                </L7p:item>
            </L7p:Predicates>
        </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
        <L7p:Include>
            <L7p:Enabled booleanValue="false"/>
            <L7p:PolicyGuid stringValue="a45e324c-eb67-43fc-81da-c34c16937214"/>
            <L7p:PolicyName stringValue="#OTK Third Party Configuration"/>
        </L7p:Include>
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue=""/>
            <L7p:ContentType stringValue="application/x-www-form-urlencoded"/>
            <L7p:DataType variableDataType="message"/>
            <L7p:Enabled booleanValue="false"/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="third_party_token_req"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue=""/>
            <L7p:ContentType stringValue="application/json; charset=utf-8"/>
            <L7p:DataType variableDataType="message"/>
            <L7p:Enabled booleanValue="false"/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="third_party_token_resp"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
        <L7p:HttpRoutingAssertion>
            <L7p:Enabled booleanValue="false"/>
            <L7p:FailOnErrorStatus booleanValue="false"/>
            <L7p:HttpMethod httpMethod="POST"/>
            <L7p:ProtectedServiceUrl stringValue="${third_party_oidc.token_endpoint}"/>
            <L7p:RequestHeaderRules httpPassthroughRuleSet="included">
                <L7p:ForwardAll booleanValue="true"/>
                <L7p:Rules httpPassthroughRules="included">
                    <L7p:item httpPassthroughRule="included">
                        <L7p:Name stringValue="Cookie"/>
                    </L7p:item>
                    <L7p:item httpPassthroughRule="included">
                        <L7p:Name stringValue="SOAPAction"/>
                    </L7p:item>
                </L7p:Rules>
            </L7p:RequestHeaderRules>
            <L7p:RequestMsgSrc stringValue="third_party_token_req"/>
            <L7p:RequestParamRules httpPassthroughRuleSet="included">
                <L7p:ForwardAll booleanValue="true"/>
                <L7p:Rules httpPassthroughRules="included"/>
            </L7p:RequestParamRules>
            <L7p:ResponseHeaderRules httpPassthroughRuleSet="included">
                <L7p:ForwardAll booleanValue="true"/>
                <L7p:Rules httpPassthroughRules="included">
                    <L7p:item httpPassthroughRule="included">
                        <L7p:Name stringValue="Set-Cookie"/>
                    </L7p:item>
                </L7p:Rules>
            </L7p:ResponseHeaderRules>
            <L7p:ResponseMsgDest stringValue="third_party_token_resp"/>
            <L7p:SamlAssertionVersion intValue="2"/>
        </L7p:HttpRoutingAssertion>
        <L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpression>
            <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="Extract access token"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:AssertionComment>
            <L7p:Enabled booleanValue="false"/>
            <L7p:Expression stringValue="access_token"/>
            <L7p:OtherTargetMessageVariable stringValue="third_party_token_resp"/>
            <L7p:Target target="OTHER"/>
            <L7p:VariablePrefix stringValue="at"/>
        </L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpression>
        <L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpression>
            <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="Extract id token"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:AssertionComment>
            <L7p:Enabled booleanValue="false"/>
            <L7p:Expression stringValue="id_token"/>
            <L7p:OtherTargetMessageVariable stringValue="third_party_token_resp"/>
            <L7p:Target target="OTHER"/>
            <L7p:VariablePrefix stringValue="idt"/>
        </L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpression>
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue=""/>
            <L7p:Enabled booleanValue="false"/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="useracr.result"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
        <wsp:OneOrMore L7p:Enabled="false" wsp:Usage="Required">
            <wsp:All L7p:Enabled="false" wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:DecodeJsonWebToken>
                    <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="//decode access token"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Properties>
                    </L7p:AssertionComment>
                    <L7p:Enabled booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:SourcePayload stringValue="${at.result}"/>
                    <L7p:TargetVariablePrefix stringValue="jwt"/>
                    <L7p:ValidationType stringValue="None"/>
                </L7p:DecodeJsonWebToken>
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtqd3QucGF5bG9hZH0="/>
                    <L7p:ContentType stringValue="application/json"/>
                    <L7p:DataType variableDataType="message"/>
                    <L7p:Enabled booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="third_party_login_profile"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpression>
                    <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="//extract user risk score from JWT"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Properties>
                    </L7p:AssertionComment>
                    <L7p:Enabled booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:Expression stringValue="user_riskscore"/>
                    <L7p:OtherTargetMessageVariable stringValue="third_party_login_profile"/>
                    <L7p:Target target="OTHER"/>
                    <L7p:VariablePrefix stringValue="riskscore"/>
                </L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpression>
                <L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpression>
                    <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="//extract login username from JWT"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Properties>
                    </L7p:AssertionComment>
                    <L7p:Enabled booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:Expression stringValue="user_loginid"/>
                    <L7p:OtherTargetMessageVariable stringValue="third_party_login_profile"/>
                    <L7p:Target target="OTHER"/>
                    <L7p:VariablePrefix stringValue="userlogin"/>
                </L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpression>
                <L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpression>
                    <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="Optional"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="//This is returned in access_token from SSP. This can be ignored for other openid providers"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Properties>
                    </L7p:AssertionComment>
                    <L7p:Enabled booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:Expression stringValue="user_acr"/>
                    <L7p:OtherTargetMessageVariable stringValue="third_party_login_profile"/>
                    <L7p:Target target="OTHER"/>
                    <L7p:VariablePrefix stringValue="useracr"/>
                </L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpression>
                <L7p:assertionComment>
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="//extract info from access token"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:assertionComment>
            </wsp:All>
            <wsp:All L7p:Enabled="false" wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:DecodeJsonWebToken>
                    <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="//decode id token"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Properties>
                    </L7p:AssertionComment>
                    <L7p:Enabled booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:SourcePayload stringValue="${idt.result}"/>
                    <L7p:TargetVariablePrefix stringValue="jwt"/>
                    <L7p:ValidationType stringValue="None"/>
                </L7p:DecodeJsonWebToken>
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtqd3QucGF5bG9hZH0="/>
                    <L7p:ContentType stringValue="application/json"/>
                    <L7p:DataType variableDataType="message"/>
                    <L7p:Enabled booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="third_party_login_profile"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpression>
                    <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="//extract login username from JWT - It is email in Google OIDC"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Properties>
                    </L7p:AssertionComment>
                    <L7p:Enabled booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:Expression stringValue="email"/>
                    <L7p:OtherTargetMessageVariable stringValue="third_party_login_profile"/>
                    <L7p:Target target="OTHER"/>
                    <L7p:VariablePrefix stringValue="userlogin"/>
                </L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpression>
                <L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpression>
                    <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="Optional"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="//extract acr from JWT"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Properties>
                    </L7p:AssertionComment>
                    <L7p:Enabled booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:Expression stringValue="acr"/>
                    <L7p:OtherTargetMessageVariable stringValue="third_party_login_profile"/>
                    <L7p:Target target="OTHER"/>
                    <L7p:VariablePrefix stringValue="useracr"/>
                </L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpression>
                <L7p:assertionComment>
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="//fail to get user login info from access token, so extract it from id_token"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:assertionComment>
            </wsp:All>
            <L7p:assertionComment>
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="//Extract Info"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:assertionComment>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>

        </L7p:CommentAssertion>

            <L7p:Comment stringValue="=== Set custom values for Context Variables below ==="/>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Policy Fragment: #OTK Token Rank"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="This policy is used for mapping authentication metadata like acr to token rank"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="The example in disabled block calculates token_rank based on the acr value"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <wsp:OneOrMore L7p:Enabled="false" wsp:Usage="Required">
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${acr}"/>
                    <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="0"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item binary="included">
                            <L7p:RightValue stringValue="0"/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="MA=="/>
                    <L7p:DataType variableDataType="int"/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="token_rank"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
            </wsp:All>
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${acr}"/>
                    <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="1"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item binary="included">
                            <L7p:RightValue stringValue="1"/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="MQ=="/>
                    <L7p:DataType variableDataType="int"/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="token_rank"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
            </wsp:All>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="MA=="/>
            <L7p:DataType variableDataType="int"/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="token_rank"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Policy Fragment: #OTK Token Response"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Use this policy to customize token response"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">

        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
