<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Policy Fragment: #OTK Validate JWT OAuth Token"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Private key to decode JWT can be modified in the below assertion."/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:DecodeJsonWebToken>
            <L7p:FailUnverifiedSignature booleanValue="true"/>
            <L7p:KeyAlias stringValue="ssl"/>
            <L7p:KeyGoid goidValue="00000000000000000000000000000002"/>
            <L7p:SourcePayload stringValue="${access_token}"/>
            <L7p:TargetVariablePrefix stringValue="jwt"/>
            <L7p:ValidationType stringValue="Using Recipient Key From List"/>
        </L7p:DecodeJsonWebToken>
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="convert payload to json, to extract values in the next steps"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:AssertionComment>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtqd3QucGF5bG9hZH0="/>
            <L7p:ContentType stringValue="application/json; charset=utf-8"/>
            <L7p:DataType variableDataType="message"/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="payload_json"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
        <L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpressionV2>
            <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="// extract JTI which is also the access_token"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:AssertionComment>
            <L7p:Expression stringValue="jti"/>
            <L7p:OtherTargetMessageVariable stringValue="payload_json"/>
            <L7p:Target target="OTHER"/>
            <L7p:VariablePrefix stringValue="jti"/>
        </L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpressionV2>
        <L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpressionV2>
            <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="// extract hte issuer (iss)"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:AssertionComment>
            <L7p:Expression stringValue="iss"/>
            <L7p:OtherTargetMessageVariable stringValue="payload_json"/>
            <L7p:Target target="OTHER"/>
            <L7p:VariablePrefix stringValue="iss"/>
        </L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpressionV2>
        <L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpressionV2>
            <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="// extract the audience (aud)"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:AssertionComment>
            <L7p:Expression stringValue="aud"/>
            <L7p:OtherTargetMessageVariable stringValue="payload_json"/>
            <L7p:Target target="OTHER"/>
            <L7p:VariablePrefix stringValue="aud"/>
        </L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpressionV2>
        <L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpressionV2>
            <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="// extract expiration (exp)"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:AssertionComment>
            <L7p:Expression stringValue="exp"/>
            <L7p:OtherTargetMessageVariable stringValue="payload_json"/>
            <L7p:Target target="OTHER"/>
            <L7p:VariablePrefix stringValue="exp"/>
        </L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpressionV2>
        <L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpressionV2>
            <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="// extract the SCOPE that was granted for this token"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:AssertionComment>
            <L7p:Expression stringValue="token_details.scope"/>
            <L7p:OtherTargetMessageVariable stringValue="payload_json"/>
            <L7p:Target target="OTHER"/>
            <L7p:VariablePrefix stringValue="scope"/>
        </L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpressionV2>
        <L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpressionV2>
            <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="// extract the Client_key associated with the token"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:AssertionComment>
            <L7p:Expression stringValue="token_details.client_key"/>
            <L7p:OtherTargetMessageVariable stringValue="payload_json"/>
            <L7p:Target target="OTHER"/>
            <L7p:VariablePrefix stringValue="client_key"/>
        </L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpressionV2>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpressionV2>
                <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="// extract the resource owner if it exists"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:AssertionComment>
                <L7p:Expression stringValue="token_details.preferred_username"/>
                <L7p:OtherTargetMessageVariable stringValue="payload_json"/>
                <L7p:Target target="OTHER"/>
                <L7p:VariablePrefix stringValue="owner"/>
            </L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpressionV2>
            <L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="set variable to unknown if owner not part of payload"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:AssertionComment>
                <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="dW5rbm93bg=="/>
                <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="owner.result"/>
            </L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:assertionComment>
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="// Sets owner "/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:assertionComment>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="// Set resp with extracted values, used for validation later"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:AssertionComment>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue=""/>
            <L7p:ContentType stringValue="text/xml; charset=utf-8"/>
            <L7p:DataType variableDataType="message"/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="resp"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtnYXRld2F5Lm90ay5hY2Nlc3NfdG9rZW4uZW5hYmxlX2p3dC5xdWVyeV9kYn0="/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="query_db"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Policy Fragment: # OTK Validate Post Logout Redirect Uri"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Customize this policy to validate request post logout redirect uri"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:ResponseXpathAssertion>
            <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="// select the client key custom"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:AssertionComment>
            <L7p:VariablePrefix stringValue="xpathClientKeyCustom"/>
            <L7p:XmlMsgSrc stringValue="client_resp"/>
            <L7p:XpathExpression xpathExpressionValue="included">
                <L7p:Expression stringValue="/ns:values/ns:keys/ns:values/ns:value/ns:client_key_custom"/>
                <L7p:Namespaces mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="s"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="ns"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="http://ns.l7tech.com/2012/11/otk-clientstore"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Namespaces>
                <L7p:XpathVersion xpathVersion="XPATH_1_0"/>
            </L7p:XpathExpression>
        </L7p:ResponseXpathAssertion>
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHt4cGF0aENsaWVudEtleUN1c3RvbS5yZXN1bHR9"/>
            <L7p:ContentType stringValue="application/json; charset=utf-8"/>
            <L7p:DataType variableDataType="message"/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="clientKeyCustom"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
        <L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpression>
            <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="// post_logout_redirect_uris(s) exist?"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:AssertionComment>
            <L7p:Expression stringValue="$..response.post_logout_redirect_uris"/>
            <L7p:OtherTargetMessageVariable stringValue="clientKeyCustom"/>
            <L7p:Target target="OTHER"/>
            <L7p:VariablePrefix stringValue="post_logout_redirect_uris"/>
        </L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpression>
        <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
            <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
            <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${post_logout_redirect_uris.results}"/>
            <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="${req_post_logout_redirect_uri}"/>
            <L7p:MultivaluedComparison multivaluedComparison="ANY"/>
            <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                <L7p:item binary="included">
                    <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:RightValue stringValue="${req_post_logout_redirect_uri}"/>
                </L7p:item>
            </L7p:Predicates>
        </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>

policies.name: #OTK Validate Response Types And Grant Types

policy.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Policy Fragment: #OTK Validate Response Types And Grant Types"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Customize this policy to validate grant types and response types"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <wsp:OneOrMore L7p:Enabled="false" wsp:Usage="Required">
            <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${grant_types.count}"/>
                    <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="1"/>
                    <L7p:Negate booleanValue="true"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item binary="included">
                            <L7p:Negated booleanValue="true"/>
                            <L7p:RightValue stringValue="1"/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${response_types.count}"/>
                    <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="1"/>
                    <L7p:Negate booleanValue="true"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item binary="included">
                            <L7p:Negated booleanValue="true"/>
                            <L7p:RightValue stringValue="1"/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                    <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                        <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${response_types_original}"/>
                        <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="none"/>
                        <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                            <L7p:item binary="included">
                                <L7p:RightValue stringValue="none"/>
                            </L7p:item>
                        </L7p:Predicates>
                    </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                        <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${grant_types_original}"/>
                        <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="none"/>
                        <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                            <L7p:item binary="included">
                                <L7p:RightValue stringValue="none"/>
                            </L7p:item>
                        </L7p:Predicates>
                    </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                </wsp:All>
            </wsp:OneOrMore>
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${grant_types.results}"/>
                    <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="authorization_code"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item binary="included">
                            <L7p:RightValue stringValue="authorization_code"/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${response_types.results}"/>
                    <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="code"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item binary="included">
                            <L7p:RightValue stringValue="code"/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
            </wsp:All>
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${grant_types.results}"/>
                    <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="implicit"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item binary="included">
                            <L7p:RightValue stringValue="implicit"/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${response_types.results}"/>
                    <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="token"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item binary="included">
                            <L7p:RightValue stringValue="token"/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
            </wsp:All>
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${grant_types.results}"/>
                    <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="urn:ietf:params:oauth:grant-type:saml2-bearer"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item binary="included">
                            <L7p:RightValue stringValue="urn:ietf:params:oauth:grant-type:saml2-bearer"/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${response_types_original}"/>
                    <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="none"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item binary="included">
                            <L7p:RightValue stringValue="none"/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
            </wsp:All>
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${grant_types.results}"/>
                    <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="urn:ietf:params:oauth:grant-type:jwt-bearer"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item binary="included">
                            <L7p:RightValue stringValue="urn:ietf:params:oauth:grant-type:jwt-bearer"/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${response_types_original}"/>
                    <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="none"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item binary="included">
                            <L7p:RightValue stringValue="none"/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
            </wsp:All>
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${grant_types.results}"/>
                    <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="refresh_token"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item binary="included">
                            <L7p:RightValue stringValue="refresh_token"/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${response_types_original}"/>
                    <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="none"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item binary="included">
                            <L7p:RightValue stringValue="none"/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
            </wsp:All>
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${grant_types.results}"/>
                    <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="client_credentials"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item binary="included">
                            <L7p:RightValue stringValue="client_credentials"/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${response_types_original}"/>
                    <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="none"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item binary="included">
                            <L7p:RightValue stringValue="none"/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
            </wsp:All>
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${grant_types.results}"/>
                    <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="password"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item binary="included">
                            <L7p:RightValue stringValue="password"/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${response_types_original}"/>
                    <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="none"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item binary="included">
                            <L7p:RightValue stringValue="none"/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
            </wsp:All>
            <L7p:Encapsulated>
                <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigGuid stringValue="56bd8147-3ab4-4d09-9460-8b2de02b7a9e"/>
                <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigName stringValue="OTK Fail with error message"/>
                <L7p:Parameters mapValue="included">

                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="givenErrorCode"/>

            </L7p:Encapsulated>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="== Target Policy:  "OTK grant_type=TOKEN_EXCHANGE""/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="============================"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="========== Validate the SAML Token v1 ======================"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:ValidateNonSoapSamlToken>
            <L7p:AudienceRestriction stringValue="${conditions}"/>
            <L7p:AuthenticationStatement samlAuthenticationInfo="included">
                <L7p:AuthenticationMethods stringArrayValue="included">
                    <L7p:item stringValue="urn:ietf:rfc:1510"/>
                    <L7p:item stringValue="urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:unspecified"/>
                    <L7p:item stringValue="urn:ietf:rfc:2246"/>
                    <L7p:item stringValue="urn:ietf:rfc:2945"/>
                    <L7p:item stringValue="urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:PGP"/>
                    <L7p:item stringValue="urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:SPKI"/>
                    <L7p:item stringValue="urn:ietf:rfc:3075"/>
                    <L7p:item stringValue="urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:X509-PKI"/>
                    <L7p:item stringValue="urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:password"/>
                </L7p:AuthenticationMethods>
            </L7p:AuthenticationStatement>
            <L7p:MaxExpiry longValue="3600000"/>
            <L7p:NameFormats stringArrayValue="included">
                <L7p:item stringValue="urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.1:nameid-format:unspecified"/>
            </L7p:NameFormats>
            <L7p:NameQualifier stringValue=""/>
            <L7p:OtherTargetMessageVariable stringValue="bearerToken"/>
            <L7p:SubjectConfirmationDataCheckValidity booleanValue="false"/>
            <L7p:SubjectConfirmations stringArrayValue="included">
                <L7p:item stringValue="urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:cm:bearer"/>
            </L7p:SubjectConfirmations>
            <L7p:Target target="OTHER"/>
            <L7p:Version boxedIntegerValue="1"/>
        </L7p:ValidateNonSoapSamlToken>
        <L7p:ResponseXpathAssertion>
            <L7p:VariablePrefix stringValue=""/>
            <L7p:XmlMsgSrc stringValue="bearerToken"/>

        <L7p:SetVariable>

            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="owner"/>

</wsp:Policy>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="== Target Policy:  "OTK grant_type=TOKEN_EXCHANGE""/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="============================"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="========== Validate the SAML Token v2 ======================"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:ValidateNonSoapSamlToken>
            <L7p:AudienceRestriction stringValue="${conditions}"/>
            <L7p:AuthenticationStatement samlAuthenticationInfo="included">
                <L7p:AuthenticationMethods stringArrayValue="included">
                    <L7p:item stringValue="urn:ietf:rfc:1510"/>
                    <L7p:item stringValue="urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:ac:classes:MobileTwoFactorContract"/>
                    <L7p:item stringValue="urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:unspecified"/>
                    <L7p:item stringValue="urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:SPKI"/>
                    <L7p:item stringValue="urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:X509-PKI"/>
                    <L7p:item stringValue="urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:ac:classes:Smartcard"/>
                    <L7p:item stringValue="urn:ietf:rfc:3075"/>
                    <L7p:item stringValue="urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:ac:classes:TimeSyncToken"/>
                    <L7p:item stringValue="urn:ietf:rfc:2945"/>
                    <L7p:item stringValue="urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:ac:classes:SmartcardPKI"/>
                    <L7p:item stringValue="urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:ac:classes:PreviousSession"/>
                    <L7p:item stringValue="urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:ac:classes:MobileTwoFactorUnregistered"/>
                    <L7p:item stringValue="urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:ac:classes:MobileOneFactorContract"/>
                    <L7p:item stringValue="urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:ac:classes:NomadTelephony"/>
                    <L7p:item stringValue="urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:ac:classes:MobileOneFactorUnregistered"/>
                    <L7p:item stringValue="urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:ac:classes:AuthenticatedTelephony"/>
                    <L7p:item stringValue="urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:PGP"/>
                    <L7p:item stringValue="urn:ietf:rfc:2246"/>
                    <L7p:item stringValue="urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:ac:classes:PersonalizedTelephony"/>
                    <L7p:item stringValue="urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:ac:classes:InternetProtocol"/>
                    <L7p:item stringValue="urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:ac:classes:Telephony"/>
                    <L7p:item stringValue="urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:ac:classes:InternetProtocolPassword"/>
                    <L7p:item stringValue="urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:ac:classes:PasswordProtectedTransport"/>
                    <L7p:item stringValue="urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:ac:classes:SoftwarePKI"/>
                    <L7p:item stringValue="urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:password"/>
                </L7p:AuthenticationMethods>
            </L7p:AuthenticationStatement>
            <L7p:MaxExpiry longValue="3600000"/>
            <L7p:NameFormats stringArrayValue="included">
                <L7p:item stringValue="urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.1:nameid-format:unspecified"/>
            </L7p:NameFormats>
            <L7p:NameQualifier stringValue=""/>
            <L7p:OtherTargetMessageVariable stringValue="bearerToken"/>
            <L7p:SubjectConfirmationDataCheckValidity booleanValue="false"/>
            <L7p:SubjectConfirmationDataRecipient stringValue="${receipient}"/>
            <L7p:SubjectConfirmations stringArrayValue="included">
                <L7p:item stringValue="urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:cm:bearer"/>
            </L7p:SubjectConfirmations>
            <L7p:Target target="OTHER"/>
            <L7p:Version boxedIntegerValue="2"/>
        </L7p:ValidateNonSoapSamlToken>
        <L7p:ResponseXpathAssertion>
            <L7p:VariablePrefix stringValue=""/>
            <L7p:XmlMsgSrc stringValue="bearerToken"/>
            <L7p:XpathExpression xpathExpressionValue="included">
                <L7p:Expression stringValue="/saml2:Assertion/saml2:Subject/saml2:NameID"/>
                <L7p:Namespaces mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="saml2"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:assertion"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Namespaces>
            </L7p:XpathExpression>
        </L7p:ResponseXpathAssertion>
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtyZXNwb25zZVhwYXRoLnJlc3VsdH0="/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="owner"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">

        <L7p:Encapsulated>

        <L7p:SetVariable>

policies.name: #OTK Validate Token Exchange Audience And Scope

policy.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="== Target Policy:  "OTK grant_type=TOKEN_EXCHANGE""/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="============================"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="========== Validate Audience And Scope ======================"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="========== Scope is validated for unprivileged clients ======================"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${audience}"/>
                <L7p:Expression2 stringValue=""/>
                <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                    <L7p:item binary="included">
                        <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                        <L7p:RightValue stringValue=""/>
                    </L7p:item>
                </L7p:Predicates>
            </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
            <L7p:Encapsulated>
                <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigGuid stringValue="00627d8a-396c-4274-a6f5-2119def8f354"/>
                <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigName stringValue="OTK RESOURCE Issuing - Extended"/>
                <L7p:Parameters mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="resource.permitted"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="${resource.registered}"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="resource.requested"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="${audience}"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Parameters>
            </L7p:Encapsulated>
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="MTYw"/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="error.code"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:FalseAssertion/>
            </wsp:All>
            <L7p:assertionComment>
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="// validate audience"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:assertionComment>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${resource}"/>
                <L7p:Expression2 stringValue=""/>
                <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                    <L7p:item binary="included">
                        <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                        <L7p:RightValue stringValue=""/>
                    </L7p:item>
                </L7p:Predicates>
            </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
            <L7p:Encapsulated>
                <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigGuid stringValue="00627d8a-396c-4274-a6f5-2119def8f354"/>
                <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigName stringValue="OTK RESOURCE Issuing - Extended"/>
                <L7p:Parameters mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="resource.permitted"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="${resource.granted}  ${resource}"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="resource.requested"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="${resource.granted}  ${resource}"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Parameters>
            </L7p:Encapsulated>
            <L7p:assertionComment>
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="// append resource granted"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:assertionComment>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${is_privileged_client}"/>
                <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="true"/>
                <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                    <L7p:item binary="included">
                        <L7p:RightValue stringValue="true"/>
                    </L7p:item>
                </L7p:Predicates>
            </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
            <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${scope.permitted}"/>
                <L7p:Expression2 stringValue=""/>
                <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                    <L7p:item binary="included">
                        <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                        <L7p:RightValue stringValue=""/>
                    </L7p:item>
                </L7p:Predicates>
            </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
            <L7p:CustomAssertion>
                <L7p:base64SerializedValue></L7p:base64SerializedValue>
            </L7p:CustomAssertion>
            <L7p:Encapsulated>
                <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="115"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:AssertionComment>
                <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigGuid stringValue="56bd8147-3ab4-4d09-9460-8b2de02b7a9e"/>
                <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigName stringValue="OTK Fail with error message"/>
                <L7p:Parameters mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="apiPrefix"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue=""/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="givenErrorCode"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="${error.code}"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Parameters>
            </L7p:Encapsulated>
            <L7p:assertionComment>
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="// verify scope for unprivileged clients"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:assertionComment>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="== Target Policy:  "OTK Validate mTLS Extention""/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="== Add any additional checks for mTLS. "/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="== When you add your checks ensure that they are for jwks and/or pki based validation"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="All errors from this policy are handled in OTK Client validation with error code 204"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
            <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${token_endpoint_auth_method}"/>
                    <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="self_signed_tls_client_auth"/>
                    <L7p:Operator operator="NE"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item binary="included">
                            <L7p:Operator operator="NE"/>
                            <L7p:RightValue stringValue="self_signed_tls_client_auth"/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="//ensure this check is always done to ensure we "/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Properties>
                    </L7p:AssertionComment>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${certificateValidated}"/>
                    <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="true"/>
                    <L7p:Operator operator="NE"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item binary="included">
                            <L7p:Operator operator="NE"/>
                            <L7p:RightValue stringValue="true"/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:TrueAssertion/>
                <L7p:assertionComment>
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="// client certificate check (from jwks)"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:assertionComment>
            </wsp:OneOrMore>
            <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${token_endpoint_auth_method}"/>
                    <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="tls_client_auth"/>
                    <L7p:Operator operator="NE"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item binary="included">
                            <L7p:Operator operator="NE"/>
                            <L7p:RightValue stringValue="tls_client_auth"/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${certificateValidated}"/>
                    <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="true"/>
                    <L7p:Operator operator="NE"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item binary="included">
                            <L7p:Operator operator="NE"/>
                            <L7p:RightValue stringValue="true"/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:ValidateCertificate>
                    <L7p:SourceVariable stringValue="client_cert"/>
                    <L7p:ValidationType certificateValidation="PATH_VALIDATION"/>
                </L7p:ValidateCertificate>
                <L7p:assertionComment>
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="//pki parameter checks"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:assertionComment>
            </wsp:OneOrMore>
        </wsp:All>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Target Configuration Policy: "OTK Variable Configuration""/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="=== Set custom values for Context Variables below ==="/>

<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Policy Fragment: #OTK issuer JWKS URL"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="input: issuer"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="output: jwks_url"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="output: jwks"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="NOTE: Ensure setting jwks when jwks_url is not defined."/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:MapValue>
            <L7p:InputExpr stringValue="${issuer}"/>
            <L7p:Mappings nameValuePairArray="included">
                <L7p:item nameValuePair="included">
                    <L7p:Key stringValue="https://${gateway.cluster.hostname}:${gateway.otk.port}"/>
                    <L7p:Value stringValue="https://${gateway.cluster.hostname}:${gateway.otk.port}/openid/connect/jwks.json"/>
                </L7p:item>
            </L7p:Mappings>
            <L7p:OutputVar stringValue="jwks_url"/>
        </L7p:MapValue>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Policy Fragment: #Portal Look Up API Key Cache"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="=====Portal APIKey Cache lookup logic====="/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="=====Looks APIKey in GW cache. Expects CWPs cluster.otk.portalapikeylookup.cacheid, cluster.otk.portalapikeylookup.cache.ag_s====="/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="=====24-03-2023====="/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
            <L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
                <L7p:Detail stringValue="apikey going through cache"/>
                <L7p:Level stringValue="WARNING"/>
            </L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
            <L7p:CacheLookup>
                <L7p:CacheEntryKey stringValue="${apikey}_${serviceid}"/>
                <L7p:CacheId stringValue="${gateway.cluster.otk.portalapikeylookup.cacheid}"/>
                <L7p:ContentTypeOverride stringValue=""/>
                <L7p:MaxEntryAgeSeconds stringValue="${gateway.cluster.otk.portalapikeylookup.cache.age_s}"/>
                <L7p:OtherTargetMessageVariable stringValue="resp"/>
                <L7p:Target target="OTHER"/>
            </L7p:CacheLookup>
            <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${resp.mainpart}"/>
                <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="value"/>
                <L7p:Operator operator="CONTAINS"/>
                <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                    <L7p:item binary="included">
                        <L7p:Operator operator="CONTAINS"/>
                        <L7p:RightValue stringValue="value"/>
                    </L7p:item>
                </L7p:Predicates>
            </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
            <L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
                <L7p:Detail stringValue="apikey completed going through cache"/>
                <L7p:Level stringValue="WARNING"/>
            </L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
            <L7p:assertionComment>
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="cache lookup"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:assertionComment>
        </wsp:All>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Policy Fragment: #Portal Store APIkey In Cache"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${resp.mainpart}"/>
                    <L7p:Operator operatorNull="null"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item dataType="included">
                            <L7p:Type variableDataType="string"/>
                        </L7p:item>
                        <L7p:item binary="included">
                            <L7p:Operator operator="CONTAINS"/>
                            <L7p:RightValue stringValue="key"/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:CacheStorage>
                    <L7p:CacheEntryKey stringValue="${apikey}_${serviceid}"/>
                    <L7p:CacheId stringValue="${gateway.cluster.otk.portalapikeylookup.cacheid}"/>
                    <L7p:MaxEntries stringValue="${gateway.cluster.otk.portalapikeylookup.cache.maxentries}"/>
                    <L7p:MaxEntryAgeSeconds stringValue="${gateway.cluster.otk.portalapikeylookup.cache.age_s}"/>
                    <L7p:MaxEntrySizeBytes stringValue="${gateway.cluster.otk.portalapikeylookup.cache.sizeinbytes}"/>
                    <L7p:OtherTargetMessageVariable stringValue="resp"/>
                    <L7p:Target target="OTHER"/>
                </L7p:CacheStorage>
            </wsp:All>
            <L7p:TrueAssertion/>
            <L7p:assertionComment>
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="Add to cache if key is found"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:assertionComment>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>

<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Policy Fragment: OTK Apply Ratelimit Extension"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="=== The below Map Value Assertion contains OTK uris & configuration with default values ==="/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="=== 1. Request per second for each uri  ==="/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="=== 2. Key to configure custom limit for each uri  ==="/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="=== Set custom values for Rate limits by modifying the Map Value Assertion  ==="/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${gateway.otk.enforce_ratelimit}"/>
                <L7p:Operator operatorNull="null"/>
                <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                    <L7p:item binary="included">
                        <L7p:Negated booleanValue="true"/>
                        <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                        <L7p:RightValue stringValue=""/>
                    </L7p:item>
                    <L7p:item binary="included">
                        <L7p:Operator operator="NE"/>
                        <L7p:RightValue stringValue="true"/>
                    </L7p:item>
                </L7p:Predicates>
            </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:Encapsulated>
                    <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigGuid stringValue="2e6e2ef3-a36f-4548-a2c4-7b369b7ae184"/>
                    <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigName stringValue="OTK Variable Configuration"/>
                    <L7p:Parameters mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="custom"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue=""/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Parameters>
                </L7p:Encapsulated>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="***** OTK Cache Look Up Customization *****"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="** Available context variables:"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="** cacheID (String) - the ID of the cache to be stored"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="** cacheKey - the key associated with the value to be looked up"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="** maxEntryAge - the max age that the cache was originally created with"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="**"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="** Must return:  the variable 'resp' as a Message for found content"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="** Must fail if the looked up value does not exist!"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="**"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="** Replace the assertion below if desired with an assertion that supports key- value data structures"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="** If this assertion is replaced also replace it at 'OTK Cache Store Customization'"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CacheLookup>
            <L7p:CacheEntryKey stringValue="${cacheKey}"/>
            <L7p:CacheId stringValue="${actualCacheID}"/>
            <L7p:ContentTypeOverride stringValue=""/>
            <L7p:MaxEntryAgeSeconds stringValue="${maxEntryAge}"/>
            <L7p:OtherTargetMessageVariable stringValue="resp"/>
            <L7p:Target target="OTHER"/>
        </L7p:CacheLookup>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="***** OTK Cache Store Customization *****"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="**********************************************"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="** Available context variables:"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="** cacheID (String) - the ID of the cache to be stored"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="** cacheKey - the key associated with the given value for the cache identified by cacheID"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="** maxEntries - the maximum number of entries allowed in the cache.  Adding more than this limit would force some existing items to be removed."/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="** maxEntryAge - the maximum length (seconds) to keep entries in the cache.  "/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="** maxEntrySize - the maximum size in bytes allowable for the value"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="**"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="** Replace the assertion below if desired with an assertion that support key- value data structures"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="** If this assertion is replaced also replace it at 'OTK Cache Look Up Customization'"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CacheStorage>
            <L7p:CacheEntryKey stringValue="${cacheKey}"/>
            <L7p:CacheId stringValue="${actualCacheID}"/>
            <L7p:MaxEntries stringValue="${maxEntries}"/>
            <L7p:MaxEntryAgeSeconds stringValue="${maxEntryAge}"/>
            <L7p:MaxEntrySizeBytes stringValue="${maxEntrySize}"/>
            <L7p:OtherTargetMessageVariable stringValue="msg"/>
            <L7p:Target target="OTHER"/>
        </L7p:CacheStorage>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>

<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="**********************************************"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
            <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <L7p:Comment stringValue="This policy gets executed whenever an OTK Cache * assertion is used."/>
            </L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <L7p:Comment stringValue="This policy can be modified in order to set default configuration values for caches that are introduced."/>
            </L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <L7p:Comment stringValue="For each cache follow the example shown below:"/>
            </L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <L7p:Comment stringValue="- Add an 'All assertions must evaluate to true' assertion"/>
            </L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <L7p:Comment stringValue="- Check for the cacheID (name) and set values appropriately"/>
            </L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <L7p:Comment stringValue="**"/>
            </L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <L7p:Comment stringValue="***** OTK Cache Look Up Customization *****"/>
            </L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <L7p:Comment stringValue="** Customizable hook for cache lookup.  This is used by OTK Cache Handler as a policy fragment"/>
            </L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <L7p:Comment stringValue="** Available context variables:"/>
            </L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <L7p:Comment stringValue="** cacheID (String) - the ID of the cache to be stored"/>
            </L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <L7p:Comment stringValue="** cacheKey - the key associated with the value to be looked up"/>
            </L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <L7p:Comment stringValue="** maxEntryAge - the max age in seconds for entries into this cache"/>
            </L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <L7p:Comment stringValue="**"/>
            </L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <L7p:Comment stringValue="***** OTK Cache Store Customization *****"/>
            </L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <L7p:Comment stringValue="** Customizable hook for cache store.  This is used by OTK Cache Handler as a policy fragment, and is called for REMOVE, STORE and FLUSH operations"/>
            </L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <L7p:Comment stringValue="** Available context variables:"/>
            </L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <L7p:Comment stringValue="** cacheID (String) - the ID of the cache to be stored"/>
            </L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <L7p:Comment stringValue="** cacheKey - the key associated with the given value for the cache identified by cacheID"/>
            </L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <L7p:Comment stringValue="** maxEntries - the maximum number of entries allowed in the cache.  Adding more than this limit would force some existing items to be removed."/>
            </L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <L7p:Comment stringValue="** maxEntryAge - the max age in seconds for entries into this cache"/>
            </L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <L7p:Comment stringValue="** maxEntrySize - the maximum size in bytes allowable for the value"/>
            </L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <L7p:Comment stringValue="**********************************************"/>
            </L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <L7p:Comment stringValue="** NOTE:  only one maxEntryAge, maxEntrySize and maxEntries value is supported per cacheID "/>
            </L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <L7p:Comment stringValue="** Changing any of these values after the cache has been created will result in the cache configuration being updated."/>
            </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        </wsp:All>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="**********************************************"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <wsp:OneOrMore L7p:Enabled="false" wsp:Usage="Required">
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${cacheID}"/>
                    <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="myCache"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item binary="included">
                            <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                            <L7p:RightValue stringValue="myCache"/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
                    <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                        <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                        <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${maxEntryAge}"/>
                        <L7p:Expression2 stringValue=""/>
                        <L7p:Negate booleanValue="true"/>
                        <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                        <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                            <L7p:item binary="included">
                                <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                                <L7p:Negated booleanValue="true"/>
                                <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                                <L7p:RightValue stringValue=""/>
                            </L7p:item>
                        </L7p:Predicates>
                    </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:SetVariable>
                        <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                            <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                                <L7p:entry>
                                    <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                                    <L7p:value stringValue="new"/>
                                </L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:entry>
                                    <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                    <L7p:value stringValue="// configure the new lifetime"/>
                                </L7p:entry>
                            </L7p:Properties>
                        </L7p:AssertionComment>
                        <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="MTIwMA=="/>
                        <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="maxEntryAge"/>
                    </L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:assertionComment>
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="maxEntryAge"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="// check if an entryAge has been given"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Properties>
                    </L7p:assertionComment>
                </wsp:OneOrMore>
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">

                                <L7p:value stringValue="new"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="// configure number of valid entries"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Properties>
                    </L7p:AssertionComment>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="MTAw"/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="maxEntries"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="new"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="// configure entrySize for cache entries"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Properties>
                    </L7p:AssertionComment>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="MTAwMDA="/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="maxEntrySize"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:assertionComment>
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="myCache"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="// sample configuration where a given maxEntryAge is accepted but maxEntrySize, maxEntries given in the Cache UI are being ignored"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:assertionComment>
            </wsp:All>
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${cacheID}"/>

                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item binary="included">
                            <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                            <L7p:RightValue stringValue="anotherCache"/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="new"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="// configure the new lifetime"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Properties>
                    </L7p:AssertionComment>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="MTIwMA=="/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="maxEntryAge"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="new"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="// configure number of valid entries"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Properties>
                    </L7p:AssertionComment>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="MTAw"/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="maxEntries"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="new"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="// configure entrySize for cache entries"/>
                            </L7p:entry>

                    </L7p:AssertionComment>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="MTAwMDA="/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="maxEntrySize"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:assertionComment>
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="anotherCache"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="// sample configuration where maxEntryAge, maxEntrySize, maxEntries given in the Cache UI are being ignored"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:assertionComment>
            </wsp:All>
            <L7p:TrueAssertion/>
            <L7p:assertionComment>
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="example"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="// configure default values per cacheID"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:assertionComment>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="== Target policy:  OTK Client DB GET"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="This policy will be executed instead of OTK Client DB GET"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="The main purpose is to support OTK with the Classic Portal"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Please insert the policy that is available via OTK documentation"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
            <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
            <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${useOTKDB}"/>
            <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="false"/>
            <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                <L7p:item binary="included">
                    <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:RightValue stringValue="false"/>
                </L7p:item>
            </L7p:Predicates>
        </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="The value of cookieKey is used to created a signed cookie"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="Change"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:AssertionComment>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="MzY3YzI4MDYtMTFhNi00NzRjLTgxYzEtMDE0MTAxOTllZTgz"/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="cookieKey"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
        <L7p:ExportVariables>
            <L7p:ExportedVars stringArrayValue="included">
                <L7p:item stringValue="cookieKey"/>
                <L7p:item stringValue="cookieName"/>
            </L7p:ExportedVars>
        </L7p:ExportVariables>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="== Target policy:  OTK FIP Client Authentication"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="== this policy can be used to implement FIP Authentication"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <L7p:Comment stringValue="=== Drag the 'Authenticate Against Identity Provider' assertion onto this comment"/>
            </L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Encapsulated>
                <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="IMPORTANT"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="Do not remove this assertion!"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:AssertionComment>
                <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigGuid stringValue="56bd8147-3ab4-4d09-9460-8b2de02b7a9e"/>
                <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigName stringValue="OTK Fail with error message"/>
                <L7p:Parameters mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="apiPrefix"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="${apiPrefix}"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="givenErrorCode"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="205"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Parameters>
            </L7p:Encapsulated>
            <L7p:assertionComment>
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="clientauthentication"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="validating the clients certificate"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:assertionComment>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="These HTTP headers will always be added to a response from all services"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Authorization Server and OAuth Manager Security Header Extension policies will override values set here for their respective services"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtnYXRld2F5Lm90ay5hbGxvd2VkX2hvc3RfaGVhZGVyX3ZhbHVlc30="/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="allowed_host_header_values"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${allowed_host_header_values}"/>
                <L7p:Expression2 stringValue=""/>
                <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                    <L7p:item binary="included">

                        <L7p:RightValue stringValue=""/>

            <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>

                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:AssertionComment>
                <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                <L7p:Expression1 stringValue=",${allowed_host_header_values},"/>
                <L7p:ExpressionIsVariable booleanValue="false"/>
