                </L7p:Predicates>
            </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:CustomizeErrorResponse>

                    <L7p:ContentType stringValue="${content-type}"/>
                    <L7p:ExtraHeaders nameValuePairArray="included">

                            <L7p:Value stringValue="no-store"/>

                        <L7p:item nameValuePair="included">
                            <L7p:Key stringValue="Pragma"/>
                            <L7p:Value stringValue="no-cache"/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:ExtraHeaders>
                    <L7p:HttpStatus stringValue="${status}"/>
                </L7p:CustomizeErrorResponse>
                <L7p:Encapsulated>
                    <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="207"/>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="== Target policy is 'OTK User Attribute Look Up'"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="== Overwrite other variables that have default values in the targe policy and update the 'Export' assertion"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="== This policy is also referenced wherever user attributes have to be looked up from an LDAP configuration"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                    <L7p:Comment stringValue="Lookup the user from a list of known administrators"/>
                </L7p:CommentAssertion>

                    <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${given_username}"/>
                    <L7p:Operator operatorNull="null"/>

                        <L7p:item regex="included">

                <L7p:SetVariable>

                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${custom}"/>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="== Target Policy:  "OTK User Authentication""/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="== Change the assertions below to select a different Identity Provider, if needed"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="== Output:  ${current.username}, ${salt}, ${third_party_sso_token} and ${third_party_sso_token_type}"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="=="/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:XpathCredentialSource>
                    <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="// creating an authorization context"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Properties>
                    </L7p:AssertionComment>
                    <L7p:PasswordExpression xpathExpressionValue="included">
                        <L7p:Expression stringValue="$password"/>
                        <L7p:Namespaces mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="s"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Namespaces>
                    </L7p:PasswordExpression>
                    <L7p:XpathExpression xpathExpressionValue="included">
                        <L7p:Expression stringValue="$username"/>
                        <L7p:Namespaces mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="s"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Namespaces>
                    </L7p:XpathExpression>
                </L7p:XpathCredentialSource>
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="YmFzaWNfYXV0aA=="/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="auth_method"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:assertionComment>
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="// check for basic auth"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:assertionComment>
            </wsp:All>
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:CookieCredentialSource>
                    <L7p:CookieName stringValue="SMSESSION"/>
                </L7p:CookieCredentialSource>
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="c21zZXNzaW9uX2Nvb2tpZQ=="/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="auth_method"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:assertionComment>
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="// check for smsession"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:assertionComment>
            </wsp:All>
            <L7p:assertionComment>
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="// check for basic auth or smsession cookie"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:assertionComment>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Implement a RateLimit assertion here if rate limiting is required for authentication"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Enable/ Disable whatever branch is required"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
            <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>

<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="== Target policy:  /auth/oauth/v2/token"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="== this policy can be used to implement custom grant types"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="== output:  clientResponse, json structure containing issued token to client"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="== See the policy:  #OTK Configured Grant Types"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="== Below is an example implementation.  "/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${grant_type}"/>
                    <L7p:Operator operatorNull="null"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item dataType="included">
                            <L7p:Type variableDataType="string"/>
                        </L7p:item>
                        <L7p:item binary="included">
                            <L7p:RightValue stringValue="grantTypeCustom1"/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                    <L7p:Comment stringValue="== validate incoming parameters according to grant_type"/>
                </L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                    <L7p:Comment stringValue="== append expiration to token when partition key is enabled and refresh token is not used in the grant"/>
                </L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
                    <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                        <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                        <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${dbsystem}"/>
                        <L7p:ExpressionIsVariable booleanValue="false"/>
                        <L7p:Operator operatorNull="null"/>
                        <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                            <L7p:item dataType="included">
                                <L7p:Type variableDataType="string"/>
                            </L7p:item>
                            <L7p:item binary="included">
                                <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                                <L7p:Negated booleanValue="true"/>
                                <L7p:RightValue stringValue="oracle"/>
                            </L7p:item>
                        </L7p:Predicates>
                    </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                        <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                        <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${gateway.otk.token_include_partition_key}"/>
                        <L7p:ExpressionIsVariable booleanValue="false"/>
                        <L7p:Operator operatorNull="null"/>
                        <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                            <L7p:item dataType="included">
                                <L7p:Type variableDataType="boolean"/>
                            </L7p:item>
                            <L7p:item binary="included">
                                <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                                <L7p:RightValue stringValue="false"/>
                            </L7p:item>
                        </L7p:Predicates>
                    </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                        <L7p:SetVariable>
                            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHthdF9leHBpcmF0aW9ufQ=="/>
                            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="epochSeconds"/>
                        </L7p:SetVariable>
                        <L7p:JavaScript>
                            <L7p:ExecutionTimeout stringValue=""/>
                            <L7p:Name stringValue=""/>
                            <L7p:Script stringValueReference="inline"><![CDATA[var epoch = context.getVariable("epochSeconds")
var partition_interval = context.getVariable("gateway.otk.oracle.partition_interval")
var exp_interval = Math.round(epoch/(partition_interval*60))
context.setVariable("exp_interval", exp_interval);]]></L7p:Script>
                        </L7p:JavaScript>
                        <L7p:SetVariable>
                            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHthdF90b2tlbn0tJHtleHBfaW50ZXJ2YWx9"/>
                            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="at_token"/>
                        </L7p:SetVariable>
                    </wsp:All>
                    <L7p:assertionComment>
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="// append expiration as token suffix if refresh token is not used in this grant"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Properties>
                    </L7p:assertionComment>
                </wsp:OneOrMore>
                <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                    <L7p:Comment stringValue="== use OTK Token Persist* to persist token"/>
                </L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                    <L7p:Comment stringValue="== configure clientResponse (below)"/>
                </L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="ew0KICAiZ3JhbnRfdHlwZSI6ICIke2dyYW50X3R5cGV9IiwNCiAgImFjY2Vzc190b2tlbiI6IiR7YXRfdG9rZW59IiwNCiAgInRva2VuX3R5cGUiOiJCZWFyZXIiLA0KICAiZXhwaXJlc19pbiI6JHthdF9saWZldGltZX0sDQogICJyZWZyZXNoX3Rva2VuIjoiJHtydG9rZW59IiwNCiAgInNjb3BlIjoiJHtzY29wZS5ncmFudGVkfSINCn0="/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="clientResponse"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
            </wsp:All>
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${grant_type}"/>
                    <L7p:Operator operatorNull="null"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item dataType="included">
                            <L7p:Type variableDataType="string"/>
                        </L7p:item>
                        <L7p:item binary="included">
                            <L7p:RightValue stringValue="grantTypeCustom2"/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                    <L7p:Comment stringValue="== validate incoming parameters according to grant_type"/>
                </L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                    <L7p:Comment stringValue="== append rexpiration to token when partition key is enabled and refresh token is  used in the grant"/>
                </L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
                    <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                        <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                        <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${dbsystem}"/>
                        <L7p:ExpressionIsVariable booleanValue="false"/>
                        <L7p:Operator operatorNull="null"/>
                        <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                            <L7p:item dataType="included">
                                <L7p:Type variableDataType="string"/>
                            </L7p:item>
                            <L7p:item binary="included">
                                <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                                <L7p:Negated booleanValue="true"/>
                                <L7p:RightValue stringValue="oracle"/>
                            </L7p:item>
                        </L7p:Predicates>
                    </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                        <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                        <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${gateway.otk.token_include_partition_key}"/>
                        <L7p:ExpressionIsVariable booleanValue="false"/>
                        <L7p:Operator operatorNull="null"/>
                        <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                            <L7p:item dataType="included">
                                <L7p:Type variableDataType="boolean"/>
                            </L7p:item>
                            <L7p:item binary="included">
                                <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                                <L7p:RightValue stringValue="false"/>
                            </L7p:item>
                        </L7p:Predicates>
                    </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                        <L7p:SetVariable>
                            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtyZXhwaXJhdGlvbn0="/>
                            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="epochSeconds"/>
                        </L7p:SetVariable>
                        <L7p:JavaScript>
                            <L7p:ExecutionTimeout stringValue=""/>
                            <L7p:Name stringValue=""/>
                            <L7p:Script stringValueReference="inline"><![CDATA[var epoch = context.getVariable("epochSeconds")
var partition_interval = context.getVariable("gateway.otk.oracle.partition_interval")
var exp_interval = Math.round(epoch/(partition_interval*60))
context.setVariable("exp_interval", exp_interval);]]></L7p:Script>
                        </L7p:JavaScript>
                        <L7p:SetVariable>
                            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHthdF90b2tlbn0tJHtleHBfaW50ZXJ2YWx9"/>
                            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="at_token"/>
                        </L7p:SetVariable>
                    </wsp:All>
                    <L7p:assertionComment>
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="// append rexpiration as token suffix if refresh token is  used in this grant"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Properties>
                    </L7p:assertionComment>
                </wsp:OneOrMore>
                <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                    <L7p:Comment stringValue="== use OTK Token Persist* to persist token"/>
                </L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                    <L7p:Comment stringValue="== configure clientResponse (below)"/>
                </L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="ew0KICAiZ3JhbnRfdHlwZSI6ICIke2dyYW50X3R5cGV9IiwNCiAgImFjY2Vzc190b2tlbiI6IiR7YXRfdG9rZW59IiwNCiAgInRva2VuX3R5cGUiOiJCZWFyZXIiLA0KICAiZXhwaXJlc19pbiI6JHthdF9saWZldGltZX0sDQogICJyZWZyZXNoX3Rva2VuIjoiJHtydG9rZW59IiwNCiAgInNjb3BlIjoiJHtzY29wZS5ncmFudGVkfSINCn0="/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="clientResponse"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
            </wsp:All>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
    </wsp:All>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="== Target Policy:  "OTK grant_type=SAML""/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="============================"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="========== Validate the trusted issuer by adding a FIP here =========="/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="A FIP has to be introduced in order to accept only trusted clients"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Remove the Stop assertion once the FIP is configured"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:FalseAssertion>
            <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="WARNING"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="Replace this assertion with a federated identity assertion. Do not just delete it!"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:AssertionComment>
        </L7p:FalseAssertion>
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtiZWFyZXJUb2tlbi5tYWlucGFydH0="/>
            <L7p:ContentType stringValue="text/xml; charset=utf-8"/>
            <L7p:DataType variableDataType="message"/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="bearerToken"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
        <L7p:ResponseXpathAssertion>
            <L7p:VariablePrefix stringValue=""/>
            <L7p:XmlMsgSrc stringValue="bearerToken"/>
            <L7p:XpathExpression xpathExpressionValue="included">
                <L7p:Expression stringValue="count(//saml2:Assertion)=1"/>
                <L7p:Namespaces mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="s"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="saml2"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:assertion"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="ds"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Namespaces>
                <L7p:XpathVersion xpathVersion="XPATH_1_0"/>
            </L7p:XpathExpression>
        </L7p:ResponseXpathAssertion>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="== Target Policy: "OTK id_token Generation" when id_token_signing_algorithm is not HS256"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="=== This policy is used by OTK id_token Generation when id_token_signing_algorithm=RS256"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="=== It uses the default SSL key found on the gateway"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${append}"/>
                    <L7p:Expression2 stringValue=""/>
                    <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item binary="included">

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="== Target Policy:  "OTK id_token Validation""/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="== The policy is executed when the decoded JWT issuer does NOT match the iss specified in "#OTK id_token configuration" and the "/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="== ${id_token_signing_algorithm} variable is set to CUSTOM"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="This policy validates a JWT based on CUSTOM ISS.  Implement your CUSTOM ISS id_token validation below."/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="== the policy must export:"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="== ${didt.sub}"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="== ${didt.aud}"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="== ${didt.exp}"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="== ${didt.azp}"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="== ${didt.acr}"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="== ${resource_owner}"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="== ${salt}"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="== after setting the above variables, enable the export assertion below"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="== and set each variable to be exported"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                    <L7p:Comment stringValue="This branch is used with [mag] if the enrollment feature is used"/>
                </L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                    <L7p:Comment stringValue="Update this branch to your needs"/>
                </L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="// Has to match the 'iss' value in MAG Device Enrollment Configuration"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Properties>
                    </L7p:AssertionComment>
                    <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${didt.iss}"/>
                    <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="https://enrollment.gateway.ca.com"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item binary="included">
                            <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                            <L7p:RightValue stringValue="https://enrollment.gateway.ca.com"/>

                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
                    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">

                            <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${shared_secret_alg}"/>
                            <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="HS256"/>
                            <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">

                                    <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                                    <L7p:RightValue stringValue="HS256"/>

                            <L7p:SignatureSecret stringValue="${shared_secret}"/>
                            <L7p:SourcePayload stringValue="${jwt}"/>
                            <L7p:TargetVariablePrefix stringValue="sessionDataOutput"/>

                            <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="true"/>

                                    <L7p:RightValue stringValue="true"/>
                                </L7p:item>
                            </L7p:Predicates>
                        </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                        <L7p:assertionComment>
                            <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                                <L7p:entry>
                                    <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                    <L7p:value stringValue="// HS256"/>
                                </L7p:entry>
                            </L7p:Properties>
                        </L7p:assertionComment>
                    </wsp:All>
                    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                        <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                            <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                            <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${shared_secret_alg}"/>
                            <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="RS256"/>
                            <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                                <L7p:item binary="included">
                                    <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                                    <L7p:RightValue stringValue="RS256"/>
                                </L7p:item>
                            </L7p:Predicates>
                        </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                        <L7p:LookupTrustedCertificate>
                            <L7p:AllowMultipleCertificates booleanValue="false"/>
                            <L7p:TrustedCertificateName stringValue="${shared_secret}"/>
                            <L7p:VariableName stringValue="cert"/>
                        </L7p:LookupTrustedCertificate>
                        <L7p:DecodeJsonWebToken>
                            <L7p:KeyType stringValue="Certificate"/>
                            <L7p:PrivateKeySource stringValue="${cert}"/>
                            <L7p:SourcePayload stringValue="${jwt}"/>
                            <L7p:TargetVariablePrefix stringValue="sessionDataOutput"/>
                            <L7p:ValidationType stringValue="Using Recipient Key From Context Variable"/>
                        </L7p:DecodeJsonWebToken>
                        <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>

                            </L7p:AssertionComment>
                            <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                            <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${sessionDataOutput.valid}"/>
                            <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="true"/>
                            <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                                <L7p:item binary="included">

                                    <L7p:RightValue stringValue="true"/>
                                </L7p:item>

                                    <L7p:value stringValue="// RS256"/>
                                </L7p:entry>

                        </L7p:assertionComment>

                            <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                                <L7p:entry>
                                    <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>

                                </L7p:entry>
                            </L7p:Properties>
                        </L7p:assertionComment>
                    </wsp:All>
                    <L7p:assertionComment>
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>

                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Properties>
                    </L7p:assertionComment>
                </wsp:OneOrMore>
                <L7p:SetVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="== Target Policy:  "OTK id_token Validation""/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="== The policy is executed when the decoded JWT issuer matches the iss specified in "#OTK id_token configuration" and the "/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="== ${id_token_signing_algorithm} variable is not set to HS256"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="== This policy validates a JWT using CUSTOM algorithm.  Implement your custom JWT validation below"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="== This policy by default support RS256 using the default ssl key of the gateway"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${id_token_signing_algorithm}"/>
                    <L7p:Operator operatorNull="null"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item dataType="included">
                            <L7p:Type variableDataType="string"/>
                        </L7p:item>
                        <L7p:item binary="included">
                            <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                            <L7p:RightValue stringValue="rs256"/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${shared_secret}"/>
                    <L7p:Operator operatorNull="null"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item dataType="included">
                            <L7p:Type variableDataType="string"/>
                        </L7p:item>
                        <L7p:item binary="included">
                            <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                            <L7p:RightValue stringValue="default_ssl_key"/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:DecodeJsonWebToken>
                    <L7p:KeyGoid goidValue="0000000000000000ffffffffffffffff"/>
                    <L7p:SourcePayload stringValue="${jwt}"/>
                    <L7p:TargetVariablePrefix stringValue="id_token"/>
                    <L7p:ValidationType stringValue="Using Recipient Key From List"/>
                </L7p:DecodeJsonWebToken>
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="// Verify the signature validation result"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Properties>
                    </L7p:AssertionComment>
                    <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${id_token.valid}"/>
                    <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="true"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item binary="included">
                            <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                            <L7p:RightValue stringValue="true"/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:assertionComment>
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="// default: RS256 using default ssl key"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:assertionComment>
            </wsp:All>
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
                    <L7p:Detail stringValue="Given JWT is invalid: '${jwt}'"/>
                </L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="MTIx"/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="error.code"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:FalseAssertion/>
                <L7p:assertionComment>
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="error"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:assertionComment>
            </wsp:All>
            <L7p:assertionComment>
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="// implement validation for different algorithms"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:assertionComment>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
        <L7p:ExportVariables>
            <L7p:ExportedVars stringArrayValue="included">
                <L7p:item stringValue="error.code"/>
                <L7p:item stringValue="id_token.header"/>
                <L7p:item stringValue="id_token.header.names"/>
                <L7p:item stringValue="id_token.payload"/>
            </L7p:ExportedVars>
        </L7p:ExportVariables>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="== Target Policy: OTK id_token Validation"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="== This policy validates a JWT against the PS256 algorithm"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:DecodeJsonWebToken>
                    <L7p:KeyGoid goidValue="0000000000000000ffffffffffffffff"/>
                    <L7p:SourcePayload stringValue="${jwt}"/>
                    <L7p:TargetVariablePrefix stringValue="id_token"/>
                    <L7p:ValidationType stringValue="Using Recipient Key From List"/>
                </L7p:DecodeJsonWebToken>
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${id_token.valid}"/>
                    <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="true"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item binary="included">
                            <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                            <L7p:RightValue stringValue="true"/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:assertionComment>
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="valid"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:assertionComment>
            </wsp:All>
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
                    <L7p:Detail stringValue="Given JWT is invalid: '${jwt}'"/>
                </L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="MTIx"/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="error.code"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:FalseAssertion/>
                <L7p:assertionComment>
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="error"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:assertionComment>
            </wsp:All>
            <L7p:assertionComment>
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="// validate"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:assertionComment>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
        <L7p:ExportVariables>
            <L7p:ExportedVars stringArrayValue="included">
                <L7p:item stringValue="error.code"/>
                <L7p:item stringValue="id_token.header"/>
                <L7p:item stringValue="id_token.header.names"/>
                <L7p:item stringValue="id_token.payload"/>
            </L7p:ExportedVars>
        </L7p:ExportVariables>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>
